Luliact contains Luliconazole 1% w/w. Luliconazole is primarily metabolized by cytochromes CYP2D6 & 3A4, and is greater than 99% bound to protein in serum. Bactin contains Mupirocin USP, 2% w/w.  After topical application of mupirocin ointment, mupirocin is only very minimally absorbed systemically. Following topical administration, >97% of the drug is bound to protein. It is rapidly metabolised to inactive monic acid and excreted via the kidneys. The elimination half life is 20-40 minutes for mupirocin and 30-80 minutes for monic acid. Penetration of mupirocin into the deeper epidermal and dermal layers of the skin is enhanced in traumatised skin and under occlusive dressings.

Safe and effective in medical expulsion therapy for Ureteral Stones.capsule contains Tamsulosin hydrochloride Each Maxflo capsule contains Tamsulosin hydrochloride USP (as sustained release pellets) 0.4mg. Absorption of tamsulosin hydrochloride is essentially complete (>90%) following oral administration under fasting conditions. The peak plasma levels are achieved at approximately 6 hrs. Approximately 99% of tamsulosin is bound to plasma proteins and its distribution volume is small. The majority of tamsulosin is present in plasma in an unchanged form. Tamsulosin hydrochloride is extensively metabolized by cytochrome P450 enzymes in the liver and less than 10% of the dose is excreted in urine unchanged. The apparent half life of tamsulosin is 14 to 15 hrs.

Two medications are included in Telma-AM Tablet, both of which lower blood pressure. Uses: Encorate 100mg injection belongs to a class of medications known as anti-epileptics. It's used to treat disorders like epilepsy and bipolar disorder. It prevents seizures (fits) by reducing excessive mood swings and aberrant brain signals. It is also beneficial in the prevention of migraines.  Most side effects are minor and decrease as your body adjusts to the medication. Consult your doctor if they persist if you are concerned. This medication will be administered to you by your doctor or nurse. Please do not self-administer. Use of the Encorate 100mg injection during pregnancy is not advised due to clear evidence that it poses a risk to the unborn child. In rare instances, though, a doctor might advise it if the risks are exceeded by the benefits in a critical situation. Please consult your doctor. It is safe to use the Encorate 100mg injection while breast-feeding. According to human research, the medication has no negative effects on the child and does not significantly enter the breastmilk. Monitor for any unusual bleeding or bruises in the infant as well as any jaundice or other liver damage symptoms. While taking Encorate 100mg injection,may impair vision, reduce alertness, or cause you to feel drowsy and lightheaded. If you experience these symptoms, don't drive. Patients with kidney illness can probably use Encorate 100mg injection without complications. Patients with liver illness should use the Encorate 100mg injections with caution. Encorate 100MG Injection dosage may need to be changed. Please consult with a doctor. Uses: Babygesic Drops Orange is a widely prescribed medicine that helps to ease pain and bring down high body temperature (fever). In children, it treats conditions like headache, toothache, body ache, fever, and common cold.Babygesic Drops Orange is given orally preferably at a fixed time every day. Though this medicine can be taken before or after food, it is best given after food as it can irritate the inner lining of an empty stomach. The dose and duration will depend upon your child’s age, body weight, and severity of the infection, so stick to the dose, time, and way prescribed by your child’s doctor. If your child vomits within 30 minutes of taking the medicine, let the child calm down and repeat the same dose. Redosing is not recommended if your child vomits more than 30 minutes after taking a dose.Do not give your child Babygesic Drops Orange along with other medicines (many cold and flu medicines and other painkillers) that contain paracetamol, as this may result in overdosing and cause dangerous side effects such as hepatotoxicity (liver damage). Always check the ingredients of any other medicines before giving them to your child in combination with this medicine.Generally, this medicine is well-tolerated by the children. However, temporary side effects such as indigestion, nausea, and vomiting may occur in some children. Consult your doctor in case these episodes become bothersome for your child.This medicine is often considered safe and effective but may not be suitable for everybody. Inform your doctor if your child is undergoing treatment for any blood-related disorder, is allergic to any medicinal compound, or has any birth defects, liver impairment, or kidney dysfunction. This will help your child’s doctor evaluate the dose and suitability of this medicine in a better way.

Amlod 5mg Tablet is a medication classified as a calcium channel blocker. It is prescribed to manage hypertension (high blood pressure) and prevent angina (chest pain caused by heart-related issues). By reducing blood pressure and easing the heart's workload, it aids in preventing heart attacks and strokes. For the treatment of; Amlod 5mg Tablet is known for its effectiveness in lowering blood pressure. By relaxing and widening the blood vessels, it helps to reduce the resistance to blood flow, resulting in improved blood pressure control. Properly managing hypertension can significantly decrease the risk of cardiovascular diseases, such as heart attacks, strokes, and kidney problems.   To use Amlod 5mg Tablet, follow your doctor's prescribed dosage instructions precisely. Take the tablet by mouth with a glass of water, swallowing it whole. Unless directed otherwise by your doctor, do not crush, chew, or break the tablet. Typically, Amlod 5mg Tablet is taken once a day. It can be taken with or without food, but it's advisable to take it at the same time every day for consistency. By blocking calcium channels, Amlod 5mg Tablet helps to relax and widen blood vessels, which reduces resistance to blood flow and lowers blood pressure. Additionally, it decreases the workload of the heart, making it more efficient and reducing the risk of heart-related complications. If you happen to miss a dose of Amlod 5mg Tablet, it is generally recommended to take it as soon as you remember. However, if it is almost time for your next scheduled dose, it is best to skip the missed dose and continue with your regular dosing schedule. It is important not to take a double dose to compensate for the missed one. When taking Amlod 5mg Tablet, it is generally recommended to avoid consuming alcohol. 
When taking Amlod 5mg Tablet, it is generally recommended to avoid consuming alcohol. If you experience dizziness or drowsiness while taking Amlod 5mg Tablet, it is recommended to avoid driving Common side effects may include swelling of the ankles or feet, dizziness, headache, and flushing. Serious side effects are rare but can include rapid heartbeat and severe dizziness. Contact your healthcare provider if you experience severe or unusual side effects. If you forget a dose, take it as soon as you remember. If it's close to the time for your next scheduled dose, skip the missed dose and continue with your regular dosing schedule. Do not double up
Side Effects: Hypertension | Angina | Headache | Dizziness | Flushing | Swelling | Fatigue | Palpitations |

Uses: Certainly, "Dutas 0.5 mg" is a medication containing the active ingredient Dutasteride at a dosage of 0.5 milligrams (mg). Dutasteride is a medication primarily used for the treatment of two conditions: Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH):BPH is a non-cancerous enlargement of the prostate gland that commonly affects older men. This enlargement can lead to urinary symptoms such as frequent urination, difficulty starting and stopping urination, weak urine flow, and the feeling of incomplete bladder emptying. Dutasteride helps treat BPH by inhibiting the conversion of testosterone to dihydrotestosterone (DHT), a hormone that contributes to prostate growth. Androgenetic Alopecia (Male Pattern Baldness):Dutasteride has also been investigated for its use in treating male pattern baldness, a condition characterized by hair loss in men. Similar to its effect on the prostate, Dutasteride may inhibit the production of DHT, which plays a role in hair loss in individuals with a genetic predisposition to this type of baldness. Dutasteride is classified as a 5-alpha reductase inhibitor. The 5-alpha reductase enzyme is responsible for converting testosterone to DHT, which is a more potent form of testosterone. By reducing DHT levels, Dutasteride helps shrink the prostate gland in cases of BPH and may also have an impact on hair loss. Dutasteride 0.5 mg has primarily been used for the following purposes: Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH):Dutasteride is commonly prescribed to treat BPH, a condition in which the prostate gland enlarges and can lead to urinary symptoms such as frequent urination, weak urine flow, and difficulty starting and stopping urination. By inhibiting the conversion of testosterone to dihydrotestosterone (DHT), Dutasteride helps reduce the size of the prostate gland and alleviate these symptoms. Androgenetic Alopecia (Male Pattern Baldness):While not as commonly prescribed for this purpose as other medications like finasteride, Dutasteride has been investigated for its potential in treating male pattern baldness. It is thought that by reducing levels of DHT, Dutasteride might slow down hair loss and promote hair regrowth in individuals with a genetic predisposition to baldness. It's important to note that these are the primary uses for which Dutasteride is prescribed, and its use should be determined by a healthcare professional. Using Dutasteride for off-label purposes or without proper medical supervision can have risks and potential side effects. Reduced Prostate Enlargement:Dutasteride can effectively shrink the size of an enlarged prostate gland in individuals with benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), which can lead to improved urinary symptoms and overall quality of life. Improved Urinary Symptoms:By reducing prostate size and the pressure on the urinary tract, Dutasteride can help alleviate urinary symptoms associated with BPH, such as frequent urination, weak urine flow, difficulty starting and stopping urination, and the feeling of incomplete bladder emptying. Potential Hair Growth:While not its primary purpose, some studies have suggested that Dutasteride might promote hair growth and slow down hair loss in individuals with androgenetic alopecia (male pattern baldness). Sexual Side Effects:Dutasteride can cause sexual side effects in some individuals, including decreased libido (sex drive), difficulty achieving or maintaining an erection (erectile dysfunction), and a decrease in semen volume. Breast Enlargement or Tenderness:Some users might experience breast enlargement or tenderness, a condition known as gynecomastia. Allergic Reactions:Rarely, individuals might experience allergic reactions, such as rash, itching, swelling, severe dizziness, or trouble breathing. Depression and Mood Changes:There have been reports of mood changes and even depression in some individuals taking Dutasteride. It's important to monitor your mood and mental well-being while on this medication. Prostate Cancer Risk:While Dutasteride can reduce the risk of certain types of prostate cancer, it might also increase the risk of more aggressive forms of prostate cancer. This risk should be discussed with a healthcare provider. Other Side Effects:Other potential side effects include dizziness, weakness, headache, runny nose, and skin reactions. You can take Dutasteride with or without food. However, it's recommended to take it at the same time each day to help you remember and maintain consistent levels of the medication in your body. Dutasteride works by inhibiting the activity of the 5-alpha reductase enzyme, which is responsible for converting testosterone into dihydrotestosterone (DHT). DHT is a more potent form of testosterone that contributes to the growth of the prostate gland in individuals with benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) and is also implicated in hair loss in individuals with androgenetic alopecia (male pattern baldness). By reducing DHT levels, Dutasteride has the following effects: Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH):In cases of BPH, the prostate gland tends to enlarge, leading to urinary symptoms. DHT plays a role in this enlargement. Dutasteride blocks the conversion of testosterone to DHT, which can help shrink the prostate gland over time, relieving urinary symptoms and improving urine flow. Androgenetic Alopecia (Male Pattern Baldness):In male pattern baldness, hair follicles on the scalp can become sensitive to DHT, leading to a shrinking of hair follicles and eventual hair loss. By reducing DHT levels, Dutasteride might slow down this process and potentially promote hair growth in some individuals. FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions): How long does it take to see results with Dutasteride? Dutasteride has been studied for its potential to reduce the risk of certain types of prostate cancer, but it may also increase the risk of more aggressive forms of prostate cancer. The decision to use Dutasteride for prostate cancer risk reduction should be made in consultation with a healthcare provider. Dutasteride's effectiveness in promoting hair growth can vary among individuals. It's not typically prescribed as a first-line treatment for hair loss and should only be used under medical supervision. It's important to follow your healthcare provider's guidance regarding the duration of treatment. Stopping Dutasteride without medical approval may lead to a reversal of the positive effects and a return of symptoms. Some medications, including certain alpha-blockers, might interact with Dutasteride. Always inform your healthcare provider about all the medications you're taking to ensure there are no potential interactions.

Uses: COMPOSITION: PARACETAMOL KELVIN suspension is a liquid form of the medication paracetamol (also known as acetaminophen). It is commonly used to relieve pain and reduce fever in children and adults. Paracetamol is used to relieve mild to moderate pain, such as headaches, toothaches, muscle aches, and menstrual cramps. It is also used to reduce fever associated with colds, flu, and other infections. Paracetamol is generally considered safe when used as directed. However, taking too much or using it for extended periods can lead to liver damage. It's essential not to exceed the recommended dose and avoid combining it with other medications containing paracetamol. Paracetamol suspension should be administered according to the dosing instructions on the product label or as directed by a healthcare professional. It is typically given orally using a measuring device provided with the medication. The exact mechanism of action of paracetamol is not fully understood, but it is believed to work by inhibiting certain enzymes in the brain that are involved in pain and fever. The dosing frequency for paracetamol suspension depends on the age of the person and the specific product. Typically, it can be given every 4 to 6 hours as needed for pain relief or fever reduction. However, it's crucial to follow the dosing instructions and not exceed the recommended maximum daily dose if a dose is missed. If you have known allergies to paracetamol or any other ingredients in the suspension, do not use the product. Paracetamol is generally well-tolerated and can be taken with or without food. However, if stomach upset after taking it on an empty stomach is experienced, you can give it with food or milk. Yes, adults can use paracetamol suspension, especially if they have difficulty swallowing tablets or prefer the liquid form. However, there are also other forms of paracetamol available for adults, such as tablets and capsules.

Composition: Pregabalin 75mg Pregabalin is a medication used to treat various conditions, including epilepsy, neuropathic pain, generalized anxiety disorder (GAD), and fibromyalgia. It is an antiepileptic medication. It decreases pain and seizures by modulating calcium channel activity of the nerve cells. Common side effects: Take this mediaction exactly as prescribed by your doctor. The usual starting dose for most conditions is 75mg taken orally twice daily (in divided doses) or 150mg taken orally once daily. Your doctor may adjust the dosage based on your response and tolerability. Pregabalin works by binding to the α2-δ subunit of voltage-gated calcium channels in the central nervous system. This binding reduces the number of calcium channels available for activation, leading to a decrease in the release of neurotransmitters . If you are pregnant, planning to become pregnant, or breastfeeding, discuss the risks and benefits of Pregabalin with your doctor. It is important to make an informed decision considering your specific situation. Avoid consuming alcohol or using other substances that may interact negatively with Pregabalin. Alcohol can intensify the sedative effects of the medication.
Side Effects: Epilepsy | Neuropathic pain | Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD) | Off-label uses (such as social anxiety disorder, chronic pain conditions, restless leg syndrome, and benzodiazepine/alcohol withdrawal symptoms) | Sleepiness | Dizziness | Uncoordinated body movement | Fatigue |

Uses: - Used to manage the symptoms of osteoarthritis, particularly in the knees and hips. Common side effects of diacerein may include gastrointestinal symptoms such as diarrhea, abdominal pain, and nausea. The typical dosage is usually one capsule per day, taken with a meal to reduce potential gastrointestinal side effects. The exact dosage and duration of treatment may vary based on the severity of the osteoarthritis and the recommendation of your healthcare provider. Diacerein works by inhibiting certain enzymes that play a role in the breakdown of cartilage. Specifically, it inhibits interleukin-1 beta (IL-1β), an enzyme that contributes to the inflammation and degradation of cartilage in osteoarthritis. By reducing the activity of this enzyme, diacerein helps slow down the progression of cartilage breakdown and may alleviate some of the associated symptoms. Diacerein is not typically recommended during pregnancy or breastfeeding, as its safety during these periods is not well established. Consult your healthcare provider before using diacerein if you are pregnant, planning to become pregnant, or breastfeeding. Alcohol consumption should be avoided during the use of diacerein as it may worsen the symptoms of osteoarthritis and increased inflammation. Diacerein is not a cure for osteoarthritis. It is a disease-modifying agent that may help manage symptoms and slow down the progression of cartilage breakdown. The onset of relief from diacerein varies from person to person. Some individuals may experience symptom improvement within a few weeks, while for others, it may take longer. Consistent use and patience are important.

Presin-5mg is a medication belonging to the class of calcium channel blockers. It is commonly prescribed to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) and certain types of chest pain called angina. Presin-5mgworks by relaxing and widening the blood vessels, allowing for improved blood flow and reducing the workload on the heart. Here are some key points about Presin-5mg: High Blood Pressure (Hypertension): Presin-5mgis often prescribed as a first-line treatment for hypertension. It helps lower blood pressure by relaxing the blood vessels, making it easier for the heart to pump blood.  Angina: Presin-5mgcan also be used to relieve chest pain (angina) caused by reduced blood flow to the heart muscle. By dilating the coronary arteries, it improves blood supply to the heart and reduces the frequency and severity of angina episodes.  Dosage: The usual starting dose of Presin-5mg for adults is 5mg once daily. However, the dosage can vary depending on the individual and their specific condition. Your doctor will determine the most appropriate dosage for you.  Side Effects: Common side effects of Presin-5mg may include swelling in the ankles or feet, flushing, dizziness, headache, and fatigue. These side effects are usually mild and go away on their own. However, if they persist or become bothersome, it's important to consult your doctor.  Precautions: Inform your doctor about any medical conditions you have, especially liver disease or heart failure, as well as any other medications or supplements you are taking. Presin-5mg may interact with certain drugs, including other blood pressure medications.  Compliance: It's important to take Presin-5mg regularly as prescribed by your doctor, even if you feel well. Skipping doses may lead to ineffective blood pressure control.

Presin-L is the group of antihypertensive drugs consisting two major component including Amlodipine and losartan. Amlodipine and losartan are two different medications commonly used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension). Amlodipine belongs to a class of medications called calcium channel blockers, while losartan belongs to a class of medications called angiotensin II receptor blockers (ARBs). When used together, amlodipine and losartan can have a synergistic effect in reducing blood pressure. They work through different mechanisms to relax blood vessels and lower blood pressure. Amlodipine blocks calcium channels in the blood vessels, preventing calcium from entering the smooth muscle cells and causing them to relax, which results in vasodilation. Losartan blocks the action of angiotensin II, a hormone that constricts blood vessels, thereby promoting vasodilation and reducing blood pressure. By combining amlodipine and losartan, the goal is to achieve better blood pressure control compared to using either medication alone. This combination is commonly prescribed when a single medication does not provide adequate blood pressure control on its own.

The main purpose of Stiloz 100 Tablet 15's, a blood thinner and anti-platelet medication, is to treat intermittent claudication (leg discomfort, tingling, and numbness). Depending on how severe the problem is, intermittent claudication causes pain in the legs after walking for a certain amount of time and at a certain speed. Usually, this pain is not ongoing. Walking and exertion trigger it, while rest cures it. The drug class known as blood thinners or antiplatelet medicines includes Stiloz 100 Tablet 15's. The 15-tablet Stiloz 100 formulation is essential for preventing the buildup of dangerous blood clots (plaque) in your veins. In order to work, Stiloz 100 Tablet 15's widen the veins while lowering the stickiness of the platelets. Intermittent claudication (pain, tingling, and numbness in the legs). By encouraging platelets (clotting agents) to adhere to one another, Stiloz 100 Tablet 15's play a critical part in preventing the development of deadly blood clots in your veins. It is used to lessen the symptoms of intermittent claudication, which is pain in the legs that worsens with activity and goes away with rest. Intermittent claudication is caused by a constriction of the veins that supply the legs with blood. In order to work, Stiloz 100 Tablet 15's widen the veins while lowering the stickiness of the platelets. improving the blood flow to the legs as a result. Take Stiloz 100 Tablet 15's on an empty stomach as prescribed by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole with a glass of water. Do not crush, chew, or break it. Stiloz 100 Tablet widens the blood vessels and decreases the stickiness of the platelets, thereby increasing the blood flow to the lower limbs If you miss a dose of Stiloz 100 Tablet, take it as soon as possible. However, if it is almost time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and go back to your regular schedule. Do not double the dose. Stiloz 100 Tablet 15's belongs to a class of medications called a blood thinner or an antiplatelet medication. Stiloz 100 Tablet 15's plays a vital role in preventing the formation of harmful blood clots (plaque) in your veins. Stiloz 100 Tablet 15's works by expands the veins and reduces the stickiness of the platelets. Therefore, enhancing the blood flow to the lower limbs. The improvement is not seen immediately. Your symptoms may start improving after 2-4 weeks of starting the treatment. However, it may take about 12 weeks to notice the full benefits of the medicines. Since Stiloz 100 Tablet widens blood vessels, it generally decreases blood pressure. Therefore, if you are taking medicines that lower blood pressure, you should be careful. Taking Stiloz 100 Tablet with other blood pressure-lowering medicines may decrease your blood pressure to very low levels. Track your blood pressure regularly, and consult your doctor if dose adjustment is required. Stiloz 100 Tablet has also been reported to increase blood pressure and the reason for which is not known.

Uses: - Teeth Staining - Altered taste It disrupts the cell membranes of bacteria and interfering with their metabolic processes. This disruption leads to cell death and the inhibition of bacterial growth. Chlorhexidine is effective against a wide range of bacteria, including those responsible for dental plaque and gum diseases. If you're pregnant or breastfeeding, consult your healthcare provider before using chlorhexidine mouthwash to ensure its safety for you and your baby. Prolonged use of chlorhexidine mouthwash may cause temporary staining of teeth and oral tissues. Regular dental cleanings can help manage this staining. Chlorhexidine mouthwash is not primarily intended for teeth whitening. Its main purpose is to control oral infections and gum diseases. Teeth whitening products are usually designed specifically for cosmetic teeth whitening. While it can help with reducing bacteria that contribute to bad breath, the primary purpose of chlorhexidine mouthwash is to manage gum diseases and oral infections. If bad breath persists, consult your dentist.
Side Effects: -Oral Hygiene:Chlorhexidine mouthwash is often prescribed by dentists to help control and prevent oral infections, especially after dental procedures. | -Gum Diseases:It's commonly used to manage and prevent gum diseases such as gingivitis and periodontitis. | -Oral Surgery:It may be recommended before and after oral surgery to reduce the risk of infection. | -Denture Users:It can be used by people who wear dentures to maintain oral hygiene and prevent denture-related infections. | -Antiseptic Action:Chlorhexidine has broad-spectrum antimicrobial properties, which means it can help control a wide range of bacteria in the mouth. | -Plaque Control:It helps reduce the formation of plaque, which is a sticky film of bacteria that contributes to gum diseases and tooth decay. | -Gingivitis Management:Chlorhexidine can help manage and prevent gingivitis, an early stage of gum disease characterized by gum inflammation and bleeding. | -Shake the bottle before use, as chlorhexidine can settle at the bottom. | -Rinse with the prescribed amount of mouthwash for about 30 seconds, swishing it around the mouth. | -Spit out the mouthwash after rinsing; do not swallow. | -Avoid eating or drinking for about 30 minutes after using the mouthwash for optimal effectiveness. |

Octride 100 Injection 1ml belongs to the class of drugs known as octapeptides. Octolide 100 Injection 1ml is mainly used for the treatment of acromegaly. Octride 100 Injection 1ml is also used to relieve purging episodes and watery diarrhea caused by cancerous tumors (carcinoid tumors, vasoactive intestinal peptide tumors). Acromegaly is a disease caused by elevated levels of growth hormone. It is a disease that makes the limbs elongate because the secretion of growth hormone is unnecessary. Each 1ml of Octride 100 Injection contains 'octreotide', a substance normally found in the human body that reduces the effects of certain hormones such as growth hormone. It also reduces bleeding from the esophagus by narrowing (constricting) the veins. Additionally, 1ml of Octolide 100 Injection reduces many substances in the body, including glucagon and insulin (which are involved in regulating blood sugar levels) and chemicals that affect digestion.

Pantocid Tablet is a medicine that helps reduce the production of stomach acid, which can cause acid-related diseases such as heartburn, acid reflux, and peptic ulcer disease. It's also used to prevent stomach ulcers and acidity that may occur due to prolonged use of painkillers. Pantocid Tablet belongs to a class of medicines known as proton pump inhibitors (PPIs), and it's usually taken one hour before breakfast. The dose will depend on your condition and how you respond to the medicine. It's important to keep taking it as prescribed, even if your symptoms improve quickly. To make the treatment more effective, you can try eating smaller meals more frequently and avoid caffeinated drinks, spicy or fatty foods. Pantocid 40mg is a type of proton pump inhibitor (PPI) medication that helps reduce the amount of acid produced in the stomach. Here are some of its benefits: Treatment of acid-related diseases: Pantocid 40mg is used to treat various acid-related diseases of the stomach and intestine, such as gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), peptic ulcer disease, and Zollinger-Ellison syndrome. Prevents stomach ulcers: Pantocid 40mg can also be used to prevent stomach ulcers caused by long-term use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) like aspirin or ibuprofen. Fast relief: Pantocid 40mg can provide fast relief from heartburn and other acid-related symptoms. Long-lasting effects: Pantocid 40mg can provide long-lasting relief by reducing acid production in the stomach for up to 24 hours. Safe and well-tolerated: Pantocid 40mg is generally considered safe and well-tolerated, with minimal side effects. However, like any medication, it should only be taken as directed by a healthcare professional. Pantocid 40mg is generally considered safe and well-tolerated, but like any medication, it can have some potential side effects. Here are some of the possible side effects of Pantocid: It's important to discuss any concerns about potential side effects with your healthcare provider, and to report any unusual symptoms immediately. In some cases, a change in dosage or a switch to a different medication may be necessary to address side effects. Pantocid 40mg should be taken orally, one hour before a meal, preferably in the morning. Here are some general guidelines for using Pantocid 40mg: Follow your healthcare provider's instructions carefully. The dose and duration of treatment may vary depending on your condition. Swallow the tablet whole with a glass of water. Do not chew or crush the tablet. Take Pantocid 40mg at the same time each day to maintain a consistent level of the medication in your body. Do not stop taking Pantocid 40mg without first consulting your healthcare provider, even if your symptoms improve. Stopping the medication prematurely may cause your symptoms to return. Avoid drinking alcohol while taking Pantocid 40mg, as it may increase the risk of side effects. If you miss a dose, take it as soon as you remember. If it is almost time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and continue with your regular dosing schedule. Store Pantocid 40mg at room temperature, away from moisture and heat. Always consult with your healthcare provider or pharmacist if you have any questions or concerns about how to use Pantocid 40mg. Pantocid 40 contains the active ingredient pantoprazole, which belongs to a class of drugs known as proton pump inhibitors (PPIs). PPIs work by reducing the amount of acid produced in the stomach, by blocking the action of an enzyme called H+/K+ ATPase, which is responsible for producing acid in the stomach. When you take Pantocid 40, the medication gets absorbed into your bloodstream and then travels to the parietal cells in the lining of your stomach. Once there, it binds to the H+/K+ ATPase enzyme and inhibits its activity, which reduces the amount of acid that is produced by the stomach. By decreasing the amount of acid in the stomach, Pantocid 40 can help relieve symptoms associated with acid-related diseases such as heartburn, acid reflux, and peptic ulcers. It can also help prevent the development of ulcers in people taking non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) for extended periods of time. It's important to note that Pantocid 40 is not a cure for acid-related diseases, but rather a treatment to manage symptoms and prevent complications. It should be taken as directed by your healthcare provider to achieve the maximum benefit. If you forget to take a dose of Pantocid 40, take it as soon as you remember. However, if it is almost time for your next scheduled dose, skip the missed dose and continue with your regular dosing schedule. Do not take a double dose to make up for a missed one. It's important to maintain a regular dosing schedule for Pantocid 40 to maintain a consistent level of the medication in your body. Missing a dose may reduce the effectiveness of the medication in controlling your symptoms and increasing the risk of complications associated with acid-related diseases. If you frequently forget to take your medication, consider setting an alarm or reminder on your phone or using a pill organizer to help you remember. If you have difficulty remembering to take your medication, talk to your healthcare provider about alternative dosing strategies. Pantocid Tablet may be unsafe to use during pregnancy. Although there are limited studies in humans, animal studies have shown harmful effects on the developing baby. Your doctor will weigh the benefits and any potential risks before prescribing it to you. Please consult your doctor. Pantocid Tablet may cause side effects which could affect your ability to drive. It is unsafe to consume alcohol with Pantocid Tablet. Pantocid Tablet is probably safe to use during breastfeeding. Limited human data suggests that the drug does not represent any significant risk to the baby. Q: Can Pantocid 40 be taken with food?
A: Pantocid 40 should be taken one hour before a meal, preferably in the morning. It is not recommended to take it with food, as it may reduce its effectiveness. Uses: Pansafe-D 10mg/40mg Tablet, which is a prescription medicine used to treat gastroesophageal reflux disease (acid reflux) and peptic ulcer disease. It works by relieving symptoms such as indigestion, heartburn, stomach pain, or irritation. Pansafe-D 10mg/40mg Tablet helps neutralize stomach acid and promotes the easy passage of gas, which can reduce stomach discomfort. It is usually taken without food, as directed by your doctor. The dosage and duration of treatment will depend on your specific condition and how you respond to the medication. It's important to follow your doctor's instructions and continue taking the medication for the recommended duration. Stopping treatment too early may cause your symptoms to return and worsen. As with any medication, there can be side effects. The most common side effects of Pansafe-D 10mg/40mg Tablet include diarrhea, stomach pain, flatulence, dryness in the mouth, and headache. These side effects are typically temporary and tend to resolve over time. If you have any concerns about these side effects, it is advisable to contact your doctor. Pansafe-D 10mg/40mg Tablet may also cause dizziness and sleepiness, so it's important to avoid activities that require mental focus, such as driving, until you know how the medicine affects you. Additionally, it is recommended to avoid alcohol while taking Pansafe-D 10mg/40mg Tablet, as alcohol can worsen the sleepiness caused by the medication. Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD): It is commonly prescribed to treat GERD, a condition where stomach acid flows back into the esophagus, causing symptoms such as heartburn, indigestion, and stomach pain. Peptic ulcer disease: Pansafe-D 10mg/40mg Tablet is also used in the treatment of peptic ulcer disease, which involves the formation of ulcers in the stomach or the first part of the small intestine (duodenum). Stomach pain: Some individuals may experience abdominal pain or discomfort while taking Pansafe-D 10mg/40mg Tablet. Dryness in the mouth: A feeling of dryness or a decrease in saliva production may occur. Headache: Some individuals may experience headaches as a side effect of Pansafe-D 10mg/40mg Tablet.

[Constipation] Constipation is one of the most common health problems. Unhealthy eating practices, inadequate sleep, age, sedentary lifestyle, and stressful life are some of the common triggers for constipation. Lifestyle diseases such as diabetes, hypertension, and anti-inflammatory disorder also put you at an increased risk of constipation irrespective of your age. However, the best time to take this syrup is at bedtime, preferably with water and if necessary, again in the morning. The ideal dosage of this liquid for: Paraffin (Mineral Oil): Paraffin, when taken orally, acts as a lubricant laxative. It forms a slippery coating on the walls of the intestines, which helps to soften the stool and ease its passage through the digestive system. By lubricating the stool, paraffin reduces friction and facilitates bowel movements. It also helps to retain water in the stool, making it easier to pass. Paraffin is not absorbed by the body and is excreted along with the stool. Milk of Magnesia (Magnesium Hydroxide): Milk of Magnesia is an osmotic laxative. When ingested, it works by drawing water into the intestines. This influx of water helps to soften the stool and increases the volume of the bowel contents. The increased volume and water content stimulate bowel contractions, promoting more frequent and easier bowel movements. Folvite Tablet is an iron supplement that is used to treat folic acid deficiencies such as in megaloblastic anaemias (along with Vitamin B12), or deficiencies associated with reduced absorption of nutrients, and alcoholism. It contains folic acid as an active ingredient which increases the production of red blood cells. Folvite Tablet may cause allergic reaction (itchy or red skin, rash), anaphylactic reaction (swollen face, lips, tongue or throat, trouble breathing or swallowing), loss of appetite, nausea, bloating, and gas in some individuals. Consult your doctor if you notice any such side effects while taking Folvite Tablet. Folic acid is a complex organic acid essential for the production of red blood cells, white blood cells and platelets and for the synthesis of proteins that are linked structurally with RNA or DNA. It is also known to prevent the occurrence of neural tube defects (brain or spinal cord defects) when given during pregnancy. Folvite Tablet is not recommended for use in untreated vitamin B12 deficiency, pernicious anaemia, or any cancerous disease Taking it too much Folvite Tablet along with a high-fat diet may lead to weight gain and fat accumulation. So, eat a low-fat meal if you are taking Folvite Tablet. If a woman has enough folic acid in her body before she is pregnant, it can help in prevention of major birth defects of her baby's brain and spine. Women who are pregnant or trying to become pregnant should take folic acid daily before conception and for at least 3 months afterward.
Side Effects: Treats folic acid deficiencies like in megaloblastic anaemias, tropical and non-tropical sprue, and alcoholism | Used as an adjunct in nutritional anaemias and anaemias of pregnancy, infancy, and childhood | Prevents the occurrence of neural tube defects (brain or spinal cord defect) | Always take Folvite Tablet as advised by your physician | Take 1-4 tablets (1-2 for children) every day in divided doses or as your physician directs you | Swallow it with water. Do not crush or chew the medicine. Your doctor will decide the correct dose and duration for you according to your age, body weight and disease condition |

Uses: Composition: Atorvastatin (20mg) AVAS 20MG TABLET contains Atorvastatin which belongs to the group of medicines called Lipid-lowering drugs. It is used to reduce elevated high blood cholesterol levels (hyperlipidaemia) in patients when diet and lifestyle changes does not result in an adequate response. Hyperlipidaemia is a condition characterized by increased levels of bad cholesterol and triglycerides (fats) in the blood. If left untreated, these fat particles deposits in the blood vessels and hinders blood supply to vital organs which may lead to various problems such as heart attack or stroke. By reducing blood cholesterol levels, AVAS 20MG TABLET can also prevent the risk of heart attack, stroke, angina or related health problems. AVAS 20MG TABLET can be used both in adults and in children (aged 10 years or above).

Cipro-Cent eye ointment is a medication used to treat certain bacterial infections of the eyes. It contains ciprofloxacin, which is an antibiotic belonging to the fluoroquinolone class. Ciprofloxacin eye ointment is primarily used to treat bacterial conjunctivitis (pink eye), which is an infection of the conjunctiva, the thin membrane covering the white part of the eye and the inner surface of the eyelids. It is effective against certain bacteria that commonly cause eye infections. Ciprofloxacin eye ointment is generally well-tolerated, but some individuals may experience mild side effects such as temporary blurred vision or mild eye irritation. Ciprofloxacin eye ointment is typically applied directly onto the affected eye(s) as a thin strip of ointment. The exact frequency and duration of use will depend on the specific condition being treated and the recommendation of your healthcare professional. It's important to follow the prescribed dosage and instructions provided by your healthcare professional or the medication packaging. Ciprofloxacin works by inhibiting the bacterial enzyme DNA gyrase, which is involved in the replication and repair of bacterial DNA. By interfering with DNA synthesis and replication, ciprofloxacin prevents the growth and spread of bacteria, helping to resolve the infection. Before applying the eye ointment, wash your hands thoroughly. Tilt your head back slightly and pull down the lower eyelid to create a small pocket. Gently squeeze a small amount of the ointment into the pocket without touching the tip of the tube to your eye or any other surface. Close your eyes gently and move your eyeball around to distribute the ointment. Wipe away any excess ointment with a clean tissue.

Cipro Cent 0.3% Drops is an antibiotic belonging to the fluoroquinolone class. It can be used as eye drops or ear drops as directed by your doctor. When used as eye drops, it is effective in treating bacterial infections of the cornea and conjunctivitis (pink eye). When used as ear drops, it can treat bacterial infections of the outer and middle ear, as well as prevent infections after ear surgery. Cipro Cent 0.3% Drops works by killing or inhibiting the growth of bacteria that cause the infection. It is important to note that it is not effective against viral eye infections. It is recommended to complete the full course of treatment as prescribed by your doctor, even if the symptoms improve before the course is finished. To help with adherence, it is advised to use the eye/ear drops at approximately the same time each day. Read More

In most cases, you will be given another inhaler to prevent your symptoms (a “preventer”) and you should use this regularly every day. Asthalin 100mcg Inhaler works quickly and the effects can last several hours. You can use it at any time of day, but only use it when you notice symptoms, such as coughing, wheezing, shortness of breath, tightness in the chest or you know that you are going to do an activity that can cause breathlessness. When an asthma attack happens, you should take the number of puffs your doctor recommends. Common side effects: Check the label for directions before use. Shake the inhaler. While you are breathing in from mouth, press down on the inhaler one time to release the medication and hold your breath for 10 seconds. Repeat until you have inhaled the number of puffs as suggested by the doctor.Afterwards, rinse your mouth thoroughly with water and spit it out. Asthalin 100mcg Inhaler is a bronchodilator. It works by relaxing the muscles in the airways and widens airways. This makes breathing easier. If you miss a dose of Asthalin 100mcg Inhaler, take it as soon as possible. However, if it is almost time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and go back to your regular schedule. Do not double the dose. You are recommended not to consume alcohol along with Asthalin 100 mcg Inhaler 200 Mdi to avoid unpleasant side-effects like drowsiness, dizziness, or sleepiness. Asthalin 100mcg Inhaler may be unsafe to use during pregnancy. Although there are limited studies in humans, animal studies have shown harmful effects on the developing baby. Your doctor will weigh the benefits and any potential risks before prescribing it to you. Please consult your doctor. There is limited data on how Asthalin 100 mcg Inhaler 200 Mdi affects breastfeeding. Please consult your doctor before starting Asthalin 100 mcg Inhaler 200 Mdi.
Side Effects: Asthma | Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) | Tachycardia | Tremors | Headache | Palpitations | Increased heart rate | Muscle cramp |

Uses: Cardivas 6.25 mg belongs to a class of 'antihypertensive drugs' known as beta-blockers, which are used to treat hypertension (high blood pressure), moderate to severe heart failure, and angina (chest discomfort caused by a heart condition).It also helps to lowers the risk of a heart attack or stroke in adults. For the treatment of:  Cardivas 6.25 mg includes Carvedilol in a controlled release form, which aids in blood vessel relaxation by preventing the action of certain natural molecules in your body. As a result, blood pressure is reduced, and the chance of having a stroke, heart attack, or other heart problems is reduced. Take this medication at the dose and for the duration prescribed by your doctor. Take it all at once. It should not be chewed, crushed, or broken. Cardivas 6.25 Tablet should be consumed with food. Cardivas 6.25mg  is a combination of an alpha and beta blocker. It works by decreasing the heart rate and relaxing blood arteries, allowing the heart to flow blood more efficiently throughout the body. If you forget to take an Cardivas 6.25mg, take it as soon as you remember. If your next dose is approaching, skip the missing dose and return to your regular schedule. Do not increase the dosage. It is harmful to drink alcohol when using Cardivas 6.25mg Tablet. Use of the Cardiovas 6.25mg during pregnancy is not advised due to clear evidence that it poses a risk to the unborn child. In rare instances, though, a doctor might advise it if the risks are exceeded by the benefits in a critical situation. Please consult your doctor. Cardivas 6.25 mg is excreted in human milk. As a result, avoid breastfeeding while using Cardivas 6.25 mg  as it may produce unfavorable effects in the newborn. Some people may experience dizziness or exhaustion after taking Cardivas 6.25 mg. As a result, if you feel dizzy or sleepy after taking Cardivas 6.25 mg, do not drive. Cardivas 6.25 mg should be used with caution, especially if you have a history of Kidney disease or condition. Your doctor can alter the dose as needed. Cardivas 6.25 mg should be taken with caution, especially if you have a history of Liver diseases/conditions. Your doctor could adjust the dose as needed. Cardivas 6.25mg is not suggested for children under the age of 18 since its safety and effectiveness have not been demonstrated.
Side Effects: High blood pressure (Hypertension) | Myocardial Infarction | Angina (Heart realated chest pain) | Diarrhoea | Headache | Weight  gain | Bradycardia (Slow heartbeat) | Wet eyes | Tiredness | Dizziness | Hypotension(low blood pressure) |

Uses: A medication called Candid Ear Drop is used to treat ear infections caused by fungi. It functions by eradicating and preventing the development of fungus in the ear. This eases ear pain, discomfort, itching, and inflammation. Only external usage is permitted with Candid Ear Drop. Use it in the quantity and time recommended by your doctor. To maximize the benefits of this medication, it should be used frequently. By keeping the affected areas clean, making sure they are dry, and washing your hands both before and after treating the infection, you can improve the effectiveness of the medication. Immediately after application, it may produce burning, irritation, itching, and redness. These negative effects, though, are transient and typically go away on their own. If they last for a longer period of time, let your doctor know. With regard to treating fungus infectionsFungus-related ear infections are treated with Candid Ear Drop. It eradicates the infection by killing the fungus and halting its growth. It also lessens infection-related ear pain, itching, redness, and swelling. Make sure you take the entire amount your doctor has advised. That way, the infection will be entirely treated and won't come back. Apply a warm compress to the troubled ear many times throughout the day to relieve any pain. Application site reactions (burning, irritation, itching and rednes This medicine is for external use only. Use it in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Check the label for directions before use. Hold the dropper close to the ear without touching it. Gently squeeze the dropper and place the medicine inside ear. Lidocaine and Clotrimazole, two medications used to treat ear infections, are combined in Candid Ear Drop. Lidocaine is a topical anesthetic that reduces ear pain by obstructing pain signals traveling from the nerves to the brain. An antifungal drug called clotrimazole prevents fungi from growing in the ear by stopping them from developing their own protective layer. If you miss a dose of Candid Ear Drop, skip it and continue with your normal schedule. Do not double the dose. There is no information available about Candid Ear Drop use during pregnancy. Please speak with your physician. There is no information available on using Candid Ear Drop while nursing. Please speak with your physician. Patients with known allergies to Candid Ear Drop's ingredients or any of its other excipients should not use it. Keep Candid Ear Drop in the tightly closed bottle or pack it came in. Follow the instructions on the package or label before storing it. Get rid of the leftover medication. Keep children and others away from it.
Side Effects: Treatment of Fungal infections |

Uses: BICO-Z is a combination of B vitamins used to treat or prevent vitamin deficiency due to poor diet, certain illnesses, alcoholism, or during pregnancy. Vitamins are important building blocks of the body and help keep you in good health. B vitamins include thiamine, riboflavin, niacinamide, vitamin B6, vitamin B12 and pantothenic acid. It also contains ingredients such as vitamin C & zinc. All of the vitamins are cofactors that work with a cognate enzyme or chemical precursors of a cofactor.
Side Effects: Glossitis | Retard growth | Mal-absorption | Poor appetite | General debility | Febrile conditions | Convalescence | Weak immunity | Skin disorders | Improves metabolism & regulates the enzymatic activities | Enhances antioxidant defence system of the body | Essential growth of new tissues & cells | GI upset | Diarrhoea | Constipation | High blood sugar | Flushing |

Uses: ACITROM 3mg is a medicine is an oral anticoagulant that contains Nicoumalone which is also known as blood thinning medicine. Mostly ACITROM 3mg is used to deal with various types of thromboembolic diseases (blood clots inside blood vessels), including deep vein thrombosis (blood clots in leg veins) and pulmonary embolism (blood clots in the lung). Blood clots (also known as thrombosis) are semi-solid masses of blood cells deposited within the blood vessels. It happens due to excessive clumping of platelets (blood cells) or other blood proteins within the blood vessels. As a result, it blocks them and reduces blood flow within the vessel, leading to various complications such as deep vein thrombosis (blood clot in veins of legs), pulmonary embolism (blood clot in veins of lungs), heart attack, abnormal heart rate or stroke. ACITROM can also be used as an adjunct in the treatment of coronary occlusion (block in the heart which reduces oxygen and blood supply leading to heart attack) and transient cerebral ischemic attacks (mini-stroke, caused by a blockage in the blood vessel supplying the brain). Nicoumalone is a blood thinning medication. It works by preventing the formation of blood clots within the blood vessels. It blocks the actions of certain blood proteins and enzymes that forms blood clots in the body. As a result, it reduces the risk of heart attack and other serious complications such as stroke, deep vein thrombosis or pulmonary embolism. ACITROM cannot dissolve an existing blood clot, but it can prevent them from growing larger. During treatment with ACITROM, your doctor would regularly monitor your blood clotting time to avoid the risk of unwanted side effects.

- Eye Allergy - Eye Redness Side effects can include temporary stinging, burning, or mild discomfort. Prolonged or excessive use can lead to rebound redness or worsening symptoms. Camphoris known for its cooling and soothing properties. In eye drops, it can provide a mild cooling sensation and help alleviate discomfort and irritation.Chlorpheniramineis an antihistamine, which means it can help reduce allergic reactions and associated symptoms like itching and redness. It blocks the effects of histamine, a chemical released during allergic responses.Mentholcontributes to the cooling and soothing sensation. It can help alleviate minor eye discomfort and provide relief from irritation.Naphazolineandphenylephrineare vasoconstrictors that work by narrowing blood vessels in the eyes. This helps reduce redness and minor irritation. Ocurest AH Eye Drop may cause blurring of your vision for a short time just after its use. Do not drive until your vision is clear. Information regarding the use of Ocurest AH Eye Drop during pregnancy is not available. Please consult your doctor. No, you should remove contact lenses while using these Ocurest AH eye drops. You can re-insert the lenses after 10-15 mins of use. You should complete the full course of Ocurest AH eye drops for an effective treatment. Also, avoid the long-term usage of these eye drops.
Side Effects: -Tilt your head backward slightly and look upward. | -With one hand, gently pull down your lower eyelid to create a small pocket between your eyelid and your eye. | -Hold the eye drop bottle with your other hand and position it above the open pocket created by your lower eyelid. | -Squeeze the bottle gently to instill the prescribed number of drops into the pocket. | -Avoid touching your eye or eyelashes with the dropper. | -Close your eyes gently to help distribute the eye drops evenly over the surface of your eye. |

Uses: Composition:  Levocetirizine (5mg) + Montelukast (10mg)  Montina-L Tablet is a combination medicine used in the treatment of allergic symptoms such as runny nose, stuffy nose, sneezing, itching, swelling, watery eyes and congestion or stuffiness. It also reduces inflammation in the airways and make breathing easier.  Allergic rhinitis (also known as hay fever) is a heterogeneous disorder characterized by inflammation of the inner lining of nose accompanied by nasal decongestion, repeated sneezing, wheezing, or a red, watery and itchy eyes. It is usually caused by allergens such as pollens, dusts, mould or flakes of skin from certain animals and can occur seasonally or year-round.  Montina-L Tablet is taken with or without food in a dose and duration as advised by the doctor. The dose you are given will depend on your condition and how you respond to the medicine. You should keep taking this medicine for as long as your doctor recommends. MONTINA L TABLET is contraindicated for use in patients having severe kidney impairment. Consult your doctor before use. Avoid consumption of alcohol while taking MONTINA L TABLET as it could make you feel drowsier.   Common side effects: Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. Montina-L Tablet may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time. Montina-L Tablet is a combination of two medicines: Levocetirizine and Montelukast, which relieves sneezing and runny nose due to allergies. Levocetirizine is an antiallergic which blocks a chemical messenger (histamine) responsible for runny nose, watery eyes and sneezing. Montelukast is a leukotriene antagonist. It works by blocking another chemical messenger (leukotriene). This reduces inflammation (swelling) in the airways and nose, and improves symptoms. Caution is advised when consuming alcohol with Montina-L Tablet. Please consult your doctor. Montina-L Tablet is generally considered safe to use during pregnancy. Animal studies have shown low or no adverse effects to the developing baby; however, there are limited human studies. Montina-L Tablet is unsafe to use during breastfeeding. Data suggests that the drug may cause toxicity to the baby.
Side Effects: Treatment of Sneezing and runny nose due to allergies | Treatment of Hay fever | Treatment of Allergic skin conditions | Nausea | Diarrhea | Dryness in mouth | Fatigue | Headache | Skin rash | Sleepiness | Vomiting |

Uses: Momate Ointment 15 gm is a member of the corticosteroid drug class and is used to lessen inflammation (swelling), itching, and redness brought on by dermatitis or psoriasis, two conditions that affect the skin. A common skin ailment known as dermatitis causes dry, itchy, or puffy skin. Skin cells develop more quickly than they should in psoriasis, causing white scales and dry, painful patches. Mometasone, a strong corticosteroid found in Momate Ointment 15 gm, inhibits the release of specific inflammatory molecules in the body that produce redness, itching, and swelling by acting inside skin cells. These chemicals are generally released when the skin reacts to allergens.  Swelling Redness, and Itching due to Psoriasis or Dermatitis Cream/ointment: It can only be applied externally. Apply a tiny amount of cream or ointment to the affected region, which should be clean and dry, as directed by your doctor. Avoid getting lotion or ointment in your mouth, nose, or eyes. Rinse with water liberally if you come into contact with these areas by accident. If your hands are not the affected region, wash your hands before and after applying cream or ointment.Shake the lotion bottle vigorously. As directed by the doctor, spread it evenly over the affected region. The hair follicles are inflamed Acne Skin that is thinner Itching feeling of stinging, tingling, or burning This medicine is for external use only. Use it in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Check the label for directions before use. Clean and dry the affected area and gently massage the ointment. Momate Ointment is a steroid. It works by blocking the production of certain chemical messengers (prostaglandins) that make the skin red, swollen, and itchy. If you miss a dose of Momate Ointment, apply it as soon as possible. However, if it is almost time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and go back to your regular schedule. Do not double the dose. Momate Ointment is probably safe to use during breastfeeding. Limited human data suggests that the drug does not represent any significant risk to the baby. Momate Ointment may be unsafe to use during pregnancy. Although there are limited studies in humans, animal studies have shown harmful effects on the developing baby. Your doctor will weigh the benefits and any potential risks before prescribing it to you. Please consult your doctor. Momate Ointment does not contain either an antibiotic or an antifungal. It is a corticosteroid that is used to treat a variety of illnesses by reducing inflammation (redness, swelling). For external use, it is offered as an ointment, cream, and lotion. Additionally, it is offered as a powder for inhalation or as a nasal spray. Momate Ointment is a steroid medicine which is used on the skin to relieve inflammatory and itchy skin diseases. It also helps in reducing redness, scaling and swelling associated with these conditions. Do not take this medicine without consulting your doctor.

This combination is used to manage blood sugar levels in individuals with type 2 diabetes when lifestyle changes alone (such as diet and exercise) are not sufficient. Common side effects may include nausea, stomach upset, diarrhea, or hypoglycemia (low blood sugar). Typically, these tablets are taken orally with meals. Metforminis an oral antidiabetic medication that belongs to the class of biguanides. It helps lower blood sugar levels by improving insulin sensitivity in the body and reducing the amount of glucose produced by the liver.Glimepirideis an oral antidiabetic medication known as a sulfonylurea. It works by stimulating the pancreas to produce more insulin, which helps lower blood sugar levels. If you miss a dose, take it as soon as you remember. However, if it's close to the time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and continue with your regular dosing schedule. Do not double the dose to catch up. Alcohol consumption can interact with these medications and increase the risk of hypoglycemia (low blood sugar). It's advisable to limit or avoid alcohol while on this medication. Individuals with kidney or liver problems may need dose adjustments or closer monitoring when taking Metformin. Your doctor will determine the appropriate course of action based on your specific situation. Consult your healthcare provider before taking these tablets if you are pregnant, planning to become pregnant, or breastfeeding. Your doctor will assess the risks and benefits and provide guidance based on your situation. Yes, these tablets can typically be taken with meals. Taking them with food can help reduce the gastrointestinal side effects that can sometimes occur with Metformin. Do not stop or change the dosage of these medications without consulting your healthcare provider. Stopping the medication abruptly can lead to uncontrolled blood sugar levels.

It is used to manage type 2 diabetes mellitus. This combination therapy is used to help lower blood sugar levels in individuals who have not achieved adequate glycemic control with diet, exercise, and metformin monotherapy or for those already on linagliptin and metformin as separate tablets. Common side effects may include headache, gastrointestinal discomfort, and upper respiratory tract infection. Serious side effects are rare but may include lactic acidosis (a rare but potentially life-threatening condition associated with metformin use). If you experience any concerning side effects, seek medical attention promptly. LINAMET 850 tablets are taken orally, once or twice daily, with meals. Your healthcare provider will determine the appropriate dosing frequency based on your specific needs. Linagliptinis a dipeptidyl peptidase-4 (DPP-4) inhibitor that increases the levels of incretin hormones, leading to enhanced insulin secretion and reduced glucagon secretion.Metforminworks by reducing hepatic glucose production and improving insulin sensitivity in muscle cells, leading to decreased glucose release by the liver and increased glucose uptake by muscle cells. If you forget to take a dose, take it as soon as you remember, unless it is close to the time of your next scheduled dose. Do not double the dose to make up for the missed one. It's generally best to avoid excessive alcohol consumption when taking diabetes medications, including LINAMET 850mg tablets, as it can affect blood sugar levels. When used alone, Linagliptin is associated with a low risk of hypoglycemia. However, when taken in combination with other medications that can cause hypoglycemia (such as insulin or sulfonylureas), the risk of low blood sugar may increase. Do not stop taking LINAMET 850mg tablets or change your dosage without consulting your healthcare professional. Stopping the medication abruptly can lead to uncontrolled blood sugar levels.

Sitagliptin phosphate 50 mg tablets are primarily used for the management of type 2 diabetes in adults. They are often prescribed as an adjunct to diet and exercise when blood sugar levels are not adequately controlled. It's recommended to take Sitagliptin with meals to prevent the risk of low blood sugar. Sitagliptin is usually taken once or twice daily. Sitagliptin is a DPP-4 inhibitor that helps increase the release of insulin and reduce the production of glucose by the liver, leading to lower blood sugar levels. It's advisable to consult your healthcare provider about alcohol consumption while taking Sitagliptin, as alcohol can affect blood sugar levels. Consult your healthcare provider before using Sitagliptin during pregnancy. They will guide you on the potential benefits and risks. If you have kidney problems, your doctor may adjust the dosage of Sitagliptin. Inform your doctor about your kidney health before starting the medication. The onset of action can vary, but you might start seeing improvements in your blood sugar levels within a few days to weeks of starting the medication. Sitagliptin use is not generally considered a restriction for blood donation. However, inform blood donation centers that you are taking it.
Side Effects: -Upper respiratory tract infections (such as cold or flu symptoms) | -Headache | -Nasal congestion | -Sore throat | -Stomach upset or discomfort | -Diarrhea | -Nausea |

It helps control blood sugar levels and thus prevent serious complications of diabetes. It is used in patients with type 2 diabetes. It helps to control the high blood sugar. Uses: FEXY 120MG TABLET contains Fexofenadine which belongs to the group of medicines called Antihistamines. It is used in adults and children (aged above 12 years) to provide relief from symptoms of hay fever or seasonal allergic rhinitis. It is also used to provide relief from symptoms associated with chronic idiopathic urticaria in adults and children (aged above 12 years), generally characterized by symptoms such as itching, swelling and rashes. Take FEXY 120MG TABLET as advised by your physician. Swallow this medicine and do not crush or chew the medicine. Correct dose and duration will be decided by your doctor depending upon your age, body weight and disease condition. FEXY 120MG TABLET works by blocking the actions of H1 histamine receptors (chemical substance responsible for allergic reaction) that results in preventing the occurrence of seasonal allergic rhinitis and idiopathic urticaria thus providing relief from the symptoms associated with both conditions. FEXY 120MG TABLET is not recommended for use in breastfeeding women and pregnant women unless condidered necessary. Consult your doctor for advice. Do not drive or operate machines if FEXY 120MG TABLET makes you dizzy or sleepy. Consult your doctor before taking FEXY 120MG TABLET. Yes, FEXY 120MG TABLET causes dizziness as it is the commonest side effect associated with the use of this medicine. If such side effects are experienced, then lie or sit down immediately when you feel dizzy. If you're feeling a severe episode of vertigo, lie in a dark and quite place with eyes closed. Talk to your doctor if the symptom does not improve.
Side Effects: Relief from the symptoms of hay fever (seasonal allergic rhinitis) | Relief from the symptoms of chronic idiopathic urticaria | Headache | Drowsiness | Dizziness | Nausea | Tiredness | Sleepiness |

Uses: Dermadew Diaper Cream is used for the prevention and treatment of diaper rash in babies. It helps to soothe and heal baby’s delicate skin. It contains zinc oxide, aloe vera extract, soft paraffin, liquid paraffin, and vitamin E as active ingredients that helps to moisturize and soothe baby’s skin. Zinc oxide helps to prevent minor skin irritation and diaper rash by forming a barrier on the skin to protect it from irritants and moisture. Aloe vera helps to hydrate and soothe the skin.
Side Effects: Prevent and treat diaper rash in babies | Soothe, soften and moisturize baby skin as well as to prevent skin irritations |

Uses: Prednisolone is a medication that belongs to the class of drugs known as corticosteroids. It is available in tablet form and is commonly prescribed for various medical conditions. Prednisolone is used to treat a wide range of medical conditions, including inflammatory and autoimmune disorders, allergic reactions, certain types of cancer, and hormonal disorders. It may be prescribed for conditions such as asthma, rheumatoid arthritis, lupus, allergic dermatitis, inflammatory bowel disease, and many others. Long-term use of prednisolone may have various side effects, including weight gain, increased appetite, mood changes, fluid retention, elevated blood sugar levels, and increased susceptibility to infections. Prednisolone tablets are usually taken orally with or without food. It's essential to take the medication as directed and not to stop or adjust the dosage without consulting your healthcare professional. Prednisolone works by suppressing the immune system and reducing inflammation in the body. It has potent anti-inflammatory and immunosuppressive properties. Prednisolone binds to specific receptors in cells, leading to changes in gene expression and the regulation of various immune and inflammatory processes. Prednisolone may interact with other medications, so it's important to inform your healthcare professional about any existing medical conditions or medications you are taking before starting treatment. Prednisolone should be used with caution in individuals with certain medical conditions such as diabetes, hypertension, osteoporosis, or glaucoma. If you have been taking prednisolone for an extended period, it's important to gradually reduce the dosage under the guidance of your healthcare professional. Abrupt discontinuation of prednisolone after prolonged use can lead to adrenal insufficiency and withdrawal symptoms. Always follow your healthcare professional's instructions regarding tapering off the medication.

Composition: Kojic acid dipalmitate, arbutin, mulberry extract, vitamin E acetate and octinoxate Kojivit Gel is a depigmenting agent which is used to treat melasma (brown patchy discolouration of face), peri orbital melanosis (dark circles) and hyperpigmentation. It contains kojic acid dipalmitate, arbutin, mulberry extract, vitamin E acetate and octinoxate as active ingredients which helps in skin whitening. Kojic acid and arbutin acts as depigmenting agent by inhibiting formation of melanin (brown pigment in skin). Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant which binds with harmful free radicals and protects skin cells from damage by destroying the free radicals. Octinoxate protects the skin from UV damage. Mulberry extract also acts as antioxidant which works by removing toxins, unclogging pores and moisturising the skin. Common side effects: Kojivit Gel may cause skin irritation and redness in some individuals. Consult your doctor if you notice any such side effects while using Kojivit Gel. Kojivit Gel is for external use only. Take pea size amount and apply thin layer of this gel on the affected area daily in morning or at night or as directed by your doctor. Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant which binds with harmful free radicals and protects skin cells from damage by destroying the free radicals. Octinoxate protects the skin from UV damage. Mulberry extract also acts as antioxidant which works by removing toxins, unclogging pores and moisturising the skin.
