Uses: Psoriasis and acne are both treated with Tazret Gel, a medication. It functions by preventing the expansion and thickness of skin cells. Do not apply it to healthy skin; only use it on the areas that are affected. Tazret Gel must only be applied externally. Always use it exactly as directed by your doctor. Before applying, the affected region needs to be clean and dry. Hands must be thoroughly washed both before and after using this medication. To maximize the benefits of this medication, it should be used frequently. Avoid using more than is necessary because doing so won't help your condition get better any faster and could worsen some negative effects. If your ailment persists for more than four weeks During psoriasis When skin cells in the body grow too quickly, they produce scales and dry areas, which is a condition known as psoriasis. They can grow everywhere, but the scalp, elbows, knees, and lower back are where they most frequently show up. Tazret Gel lessens the scaly, itchy patches as well as other inflammation-related symptoms including redness, swelling, or discomfort that may appear on various body areas. Additionally, it prevents the skin from overgrowing and thickening. To obtain the best effect, use it for the full amount of time recommended. It can take several months for it to fully take action. While receiving this medication, you should abstain from alcohol consumption and consume lots of water to stay hydrated. For acne By lowering the amount of excess oil produced by the skin, Tazret Gel treats acne (also known as pimples). Continue using it even if it seems to be ineffective because it typically takes a few weeks to become apparent. Although acne can occasionally worsen before getting better, with proper application, your skin will become clearer. Scarring is less likely to occur the sooner you begin using it. As your skin clears up from acne, this medication will assist elevate your confidence and raise your attitude. This medicine is for external use only. Use it in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Check the label for directions before use. Clean and dry the affected area and apply the gel. Wash your hands after applying, unless hands are the affected area. Tazret Gel is a form of vitamin A. It works by slowing down the rapid growth of skin cells, and blocks certain substances which cause inflammation (redness and swelling) on skin. This reduces scaling and thickening of the skin in psoriasis and clears acne.
Side Effects: Psoriasis | Acne | Dry skin | Erythema (skin redness) | Itching | Skin burn | Skin irritation | Skin peeling |

Uses: -Digestive Aid:The combination of alpha amylase and papain in the syrup is intended to help support the digestion of carbohydrates and proteins, respectively. -Bloating and Gas:Digestive enzymes like alpha amylase and papain are sometimes used to alleviate symptoms of bloating and gas that can occur after consuming certain types of foods. -Gastrointestinal discomfort Typically, the syrup is taken after meals to assist in the digestion of carbohydrates and proteins. Follow the dosing instructions provided by the Physician. Alpha amylasehelps break down complex carbohydrates into simpler sugars, whilepapainaids in breaking down proteins into smaller peptides and amino acids, facilitating digestion. Pregnant or breastfeeding individuals should consult a healthcare provider before using any new supplement or medication. If you have known allergies to papaya or any other ingredients in the syrup, consult a healthcare provider before using it. Individual responses can vary. Some people might notice benefits relatively quickly, while others might need more time to experience the effects. The duration of use can vary. Follow the recommended usage guidelines provided on the product label or consult a healthcare provider for guidance.
Side Effects: -Digestive Aid:The combination of alpha amylase and papain in the syrup is intended to help support the digestion of carbohydrates and proteins, respectively. | -Bloating and Gas:Digestive enzymes like alpha amylase and papain are sometimes used to alleviate symptoms of bloating and gas that can occur after consuming certain types of foods. |

Uses: Careprost  Eye Drop is used for the treatment of tension in the eyes (visual hypertension) and glaucoma. It works by decreasing the pressure of the liquid in the eye,  which helps in lowering the increased eye pressure.  If the pressure in your eye is too high it can damage your sight, potentially leading to blindness. It works by helping fluid flow from inside the eye into the blood. Glaucoma is a common eye condition where the optic nerve is damaged which connects the eye to the brain. It's usually caused by fluid building up in the front part of the eye, which increases pressure inside the eye. Careprost  Eye Drop is used to reduce swelling and pressure inside the eye.  If the pressure in your eye is too high it can damage your sight, potentially leading to blindness. It works by helping fluid flow from inside the eye into the blood. Treatment of Ocular hypertension Ocular hypertension is a condition in which the pressure inside the eye rises more than usual due to the buildup of fluid. Careprost  Eye drops  increase the movement of fluid from the inside of the eye into the blood flow, reducing high eye pressure. This avoids future damage or consequences, such as vision changes or loss. Careprost  Eye drops  should only be used in the affected eye and should be taken on a regular basis as prescribed by your doctor. Glaucoma is an eye disease that affects the optic nerve, which is essential for vision. This injury is frequently caused by extremely high eye pressure. Brimolol Eye Drop is used to reduce swelling and pressure in the eyes.This helps prevent glaucoma consequences such as blindness and improves eyesight. This medication can be used alone or along with other eye drops. Glaucoma cannot be prevented. Frequent monitoring and frequent checks may help in early identification of the condition. Most side effects are harmless and will go away as your body adjusts to the medication. Consult your doctor if they persist or if you are concerned This medication is only for external use. Take it at the dose and for the period prescribed by your doctor. Before using, read the label carefully. Bring the dropper up to your eye without touching it. Squeeze the dropper gently and insert the medication inside the lower eyelid. Wipe away any excess liquid. Careprost Eye Drop is a prostaglandin analog. It works by increasing the outflow of aqueous humor, thereby lowering the increased eye pressure. If you miss a dose of Careprost Eye Dropp, skip it and continue with your normal schedule. Do not double the dose. No interaction was found. However, it is advisable not to take or limit alcohol as a precautionary measure. Careprost Eye Drop may be unsafe to use when pregnant. Although there have been few human research, animal studies have revealed harmful effects on the growing fetus. Before prescribing it to you, your doctor will consider the advantages as well as any possible risks. Please visit your doctor.. Careprost Eye Drop may cause blurring of your vision for a short time just after its use. Do not drive until your vision is clear. Careprost Eye Drops to be taken with caution, especially if you have a history of Kidney diseases. Please consult the doctor Careprost Eye Drops history of liver  diseases. Please consult the doctor Careprost Eye Drops contains  Bimatoprost,(prostaglandin analogue).It is primarily used to treat excessive pressure in the eyes. It works by increasing aqueous humor (fluid in the eye) production and decreasing eye pressure. If you miss a dose of Careprost Eye Dropsl, take the missed dose as soon as you remember it. However, if it's almost time for the next dose, do not take a double dose to make up for a missed one.
Side Effects: Ocular hypertension | Glaucoma | Conjunctival hyperemia | Eye itching |

Uses: GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET contains Glimepiride which belongs to the group of medicines called Anti-diabetic agents. It is used to treat Type II diabetes mellitus when diet and exercise alone does not result in adequate blood sugar control. Type II diabetes mellitus is a chronic disease characterized by abnormally high levels of glucose in the blood. It is caused due to inadequate production of a hormone called insulin (produced by pancreas to metabolize glucose) in the body or due to inadequate sensitivity of body cells to the actions of insulin. Along with the therapy, your doctor might ask you to make certain lifestyle changes such as following a healthy diet, regular physical exercise and quitting alcohol consumption. Take GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET preferably after meals or as advised by your physician. Swallow the medicine with a glass of water. Do not crush or chew the medicine. Your doctor will decide the correct dose and duration of therapy for you depending upon your age, body weight and disease condition. Do not stop taking GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET unless your doctor advice you to stop. GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET is an antidiabetic medicine. It stimulates the pancreas to secrete more insulin (a hormone involved in glucose metabolism). It also makes our body more sensitive to insulin which helps in digesting the circulating sugars (glucose) in the blood, thereby reducing blood sugar levels. If you forgot to take a dose of GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET, take it as soon as you remember. However, if it is time for the next dose of GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET, skip the missed dose and take the next one regularly. Do not take a double dose of GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET to compensate the missed ones. GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET is not recommended for use in pregnant women. Therefore, consult your doctor before taking it. GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET is not recommended for use in breastfeeding women. Therefore, consult your doctor before taking it. Avoid consumption of alcohol while taking GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET as it may increase the risk of unwanted side effects. It is not advisable to take medicines to control blood pressure while taking GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET without consulting your doctor. Therefore, consult your doctor before taking any antihypertensive such as beta blockers (Ex. atenolol, propranolol) along with GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET as they have known interactions with GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET. Low blood sugar is a common side effect of taking GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET. Try to have sugar rich food items such as fruit juice, glucose tablets or gel, soft drinks, honey or sugary candy. Check your blood sugar after 10 minutes. If not gained optimum level, take another sugary snack, or drink, and check the blood sugar levels once again. In case of persistent low blood sugar levels, consult your doctor immediately. Co-administration of GLIMIPREX 1MG TABLET with insulin is considered risky as they are increased chances of hypoglycemia (decreased blood sugar levels). Consult your doctor before taking it.
Side Effects: Treats Type II diabetes mellitus | Hypoglycemia (low blood sugar levels) | Decrease in RBC, WBC and platelet count | Taste changes | Weight gain | Hair loss |

Uses: Ingredients: Sunthi(Ginger), Triphala Ginger stimulates the secretion of gastric juices and helps in digestion. Ginger exhibit prokinetic activity and helps normalise intestinal transit time and provides relief from post prandial distress. Triphala helps in digestion and intestinal motility. Provides relief from gaseous distension. Indications:-For symptomatic control and relief of:a)Dyspepsia/Indigestionb)Flatulence, abdominal distension, and belching-For pre-radiographic bowel preparation for abdominal x-rays-For abdominal discomfort in the postoperative period and during prolonged immobilization Directions for Use:Please consult your physician to prescribe the dosage that best suits the condition.

Lobazam 5mg Tablet belongs to a class of medicines known as benzodiazepines. It is used to treat epilepsy (seizures) and severe anxiety. It works by suppressing the abnormal and excessive activity of the nerve cells in the brain. Lobazam 5 Tablet 10's is used in combination with other medicines to treat schizophrenia (a mental illness). Epilepsy (fits) is a neurological illness in which there is a sudden a sudden, uncontrollable disturbance in the electrical activity of nerve cells in the brain. Anxiety is a mental health condition caused by fear, worry, and excessive nervousness. Schizophrenia is a mental disorder that affects the ability of a person to feel, think and behave clearly.

It is a tricyclic antidepressant, DO RE ME 75mg Tablet. It is mostly used to treat melancholy that does not respond to other forms of therapy. Furthermore, it is employed in the treatment of anxiety disorders. The DO RE ME 75mg Tablet works by raising the concentrations of brain chemicals that stabilize and improve mood. Because it may make you feel drowsy it is best to take it before night. It can be taken with or without food, but for the most effective outcomes, take it at the identical time every day. Your doctor will decide on the dosage and time frame so that you receive the proper quantity to manage your symptoms. The most common side effects of DO RE ME 75mg Tablet include increased heart rate, blurred vision, dryness in the mouth, and constipation. Initially, this medicine may also cause a sudden drop in blood pressure, especially when you change positions. It may even cause dizziness and sleepiness, so do not drive or do anything that requires mental focus until you know how this medicine affects you. It may also lead to weight gain in some people. Most of the common side effects tend to be mild and temporary. Your doctor may be able to suggest ways of preventing or reducing them. Serious side effects associated with this medicine are rare. It helps you feel more joyful and at peace, reduces stress and anxiety, promotes restful sleep, and gives you more energy. It is applied to the treatment of resistant depression to other medications. For it to be most effective, you must take it regularly according to the directions; you should not suddenly stop using it. It is beneficial to treat anxiety disorders such as depression, panic attack and many others. Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. DO RE ME 75mg Tablet may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time. It is a tricyclic antidepressant, DO RE ME 75mg Tablet. It raises the concentrations of chemical messengers in the brain that aid in mood regulation and the treatment of depression. If you miss a dose of DO RE ME 75mg Tablet, take it as soon as possible. However, if it is almost time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and go back to your regular schedule. Do not double the dose. DO RE ME 75mg Tablet may cause excessive drowsiness with alcohol. DO RE ME 75mg Tablet may be unsafe to use during pregnancy and breastfeeding. Although there are limited studies in humans, animal studies have shown harmful effects on the developing baby. Your doctor will weigh the benefits and any potential risks before prescribing it to you. Please consult your doctor. The use of DO RE ME 75mg Tablet in patients with kidney and liver disease is not well understood. Please speak with your physician.
However, several studies advise using this medication with caution in kidney and liver disease patients. It is not known whether DO RE ME 75mg Tablet alters the ability to drive. Do not drive if you experience any symptoms that affect your ability to concentrate and react. This medication has a cumulative antidepressant effect, which can be felt 3–4 weeks after taking it. But within an hour, the sleep-inducing effect can be felt. DREAM 75 mg Tablet is a medication used to treat depression and anxiety disorders when other alternative treatments are ineffective. Additionally, it is utilized to treat fibromyalgia and nerve pain. Only if prescribed by a physician, take DO RE ME 75mg Tablet exactly as instructed. This medication's effects could last for more than six weeks. However, it is subject to vary on an individual basis.
Side Effects: Treatment of anxiety disorder. | mouth feeling parched | higher heart rate | Standing up abruptly causes a blood pressure decrease called orthostatic hypotension. | gaining weight | Having trouble urinating | Constipation | distorted vision |

Uses: Ingredients: Gymnema, Indian Kino Tree, Shilajeet Gymnema (Meshashringi) principal constituent is gymnemic acid, which has antidiabetic properties. It reduces excessive blood sugar. It also has a regenerative effect on pancreatic beta cells and is insulinotropic, which means that it stimulates the production and activity of insulin. Gymnema temporarily abolishes the taste for sugar and helps decrease sugar cravings. It increases the activity of enzymes responsible for glucose absorption and utilization. Indian Kino Tree’s (Pitasara) principal constituent, epicatechin, has alpha-glucosidase inhibitory properties and regularizes key metabolic enzymes involved in carbohydrate metabolism. Shilajeet decreases hepatic glucose production and prevents hyperglycemia. Shilajeet has a protective action on b-cells of the pancreas, and promotes unrestricted endogenous insulin action.Shilajeet decreases hepatic glucose production and prevents hyperglycemia. Shilajeet has a protective action on b-cells of the pancreas, and promotes unrestricted endogenous insulin action. Directions for Use:Please consult your physician to prescribe the dosage that best suits the condition.

Composition: Deflazacort (30mg)  Dezacor 30 Tablet belongs to a group of medicines called steroids.  It is used to treat inflammation in asthma (inflamed airways), arthritis (pain and inflammation in the joints) and allergies. DEZACOR 30MG TABLET is also used in treatment of problems with your skin, kidney, heart, digestive system, eyes or blood and where your body has growths (tumours). It also used to prevent rejection after organ transplant operations.  Before taking the medicine, you should let your doctor know of all the other medicines you are taking. Pregnant and breastfeeding women should consult their doctors before taking the medicine.   Treatment of Inflammatory conditionsTreatment of Autoimmune conditionsTreatment of Cancer Common side effects: Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. Dezacor 30 Tablet may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time.Avoid Dezacor 30 Tablet with salad and vegetable diet. Dezacor 30 Tablet is a corticosteroid. It increases the level of glucocorticoid in the body and works by decreasing the formation of substances that cause inflammation and suppresses immunity to stop self damage to the body by the immune system (auto-immune reactions occurring in organ transplants or cancer). If you miss a dose of Dezacor 30 Tablet, take it as soon as possible. However, if it is almost time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and go back to your regular schedule. Do not double the dose. It is unsafe to consume alcohol with Dezacor 30 Tablet. Dezacor 30 Tablet may be unsafe to use during pregnancy. Although there are limited studies in humans, animal studies have shown harmful effects on the developing baby. Your doctor will weigh the benefits and any potential risks before prescribing it to you. Please consult your doctor. Dezacor 30 Tablet is probably unsafe to use during breastfeeding. Limited human data suggests that the drug may pass into the breastmilk and harm the baby.
Side Effects: Increased appetite | Weight gain | Frequent urge to urinate | Cushing syndrome | Cough | Upper respiratory tract infection | Abnormal hair growth | Obesity | Nasopharyngitis (inflammation of the throat and nasal passages) |

Uses: Betamethasone Valerate belongs to a group of medicines called steroids which is used to treat a variety of skin conditions (e.g., eczema, dermatitis, allergies, rash). This medication is used to treat skin infections. This product contains betamethasone valerate, a medium-strength anti-inflammatory corticosteroid that helps reduce swelling, redness, and itching. It also contains gentamicin, an aminoglycoside antibiotic that works by stopping the growth of bacteria.

Composition: Oxcarbazepine (300mg) CARBOX 300MG TABLET contains Oxcarbazepine which belongs to the group of medicines called Anti-epileptics. It is used alone or in combination with other anti-epileptic medicines in children (aged 6 years and above) and adults to treat partial seizures with or without secondarily generalised tonic-clonic seizures. Seizure occurs due to a temporary fault in the brain’s electrical activity. Partial seizures involve a limited area of the brain but may spread to the whole brain and may cause a generalised tonic-clonic seizure. Prior to treatment with CARBOX 300MG TABLET, your doctor may want you to take several blood tests to understand your existing condition and to safely use the drug and to decide the appropriate dose of this medicine. Before taking CARBOX 300MG TABLET, inform your doctor if you have liver, kidney (associated with low sodium levels in the blood) or heart problems (such as heart failure or heart rhythm disorder) or intolerance to certain sugars (such as lactose).  Epilepsy/Seizures Common side effects: Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. Carbox 300 Tablet may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time. Carbox 300 Tablet is an antiepileptic medication. It controls seizures or fits by decreasing the abnormal and excessive activity of the nerve cells in the brain. Carbox 300 Tablet may cause excessive drowsiness with alcohol. Carbox 300 Tablet may be unsafe to use during pregnancy. Although there are limited studies in humans, animal studies have shown harmful effects on the developing baby. Your doctor will weigh the benefits and any potential risks before prescribing it to you. Please consult your doctor. Carbox 300 Tablet is probably unsafe to use during breastfeeding. Limited human data suggests that the drug may pass into the breastmilk and harm the baby.
Baby should be monitored for excessive sleepiness and weight gain.
Side Effects: Headache | Nausea | Vomiting | Fatigue | Dizziness | Nystagmus (involuntary eye movement) | Tremors | Vertigo | Drowsiness | Abnormality of voluntary movements | Abnormal gait | Visual disturbance |

Uses: Composition: S-Amlodipine (5mg) S AMLONG contains S-Amlodipine which belongs to the group of medicines called Antihypertensives. It is used to treat essential hypertension (abnormal high blood pressure which occurs mostly due to obesity, family history or unhealthy diet) and angina pectoris (type of chest pain due to reduced blood flow to the heart). S AMLONG is not recommended for use in patients with certain heart problems. S AMLONG should be used with caution in patients having liver and kidney impairment. S AMLONG should be used with caution in pregnant and breastfeeding women only if clearly advised by the doctor.  S AMLONG should be used with caution in elderly patients so, consult your doctor before taking it. The most common side effects of taking S AMLONG are headache, nausea, abdominal pain, diarrhoea, indigestion and visual disturbances, etc. Consult your doctor if any of the side effects worsen.    Common side effects: Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. S-Amlong 5 Tablet may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time. S-Amlong 5 Tablet is a calcium channel blocker. In high blood pressure, it normalizes the blood pressure by relaxing the blood vessels to reduce the pressure on them, thereby improving the blood flow in the body. The enhanced blood flow in the body further relaxes the heart muscles by reducing the workload on the heart. It also improves the oxygen flow in the body, thereby, preventing any heart-related chest pain. If you miss a dose of S-Amlong 5 Tablet, take it as soon as possible. However, if it is almost time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and go back to your regular schedule. Do not double the dose. Caution is advised when consuming alcohol with S-Amlong 5 Tablet. Please consult your doctor. S-Amlong 5 Tablet may be unsafe to use during pregnancy. Although there are limited studies in humans, animal studies have shown harmful effects on the developing baby. Your doctor will weigh the benefits and any potential risks before prescribing it to you. Please consult your doctor. S-Amlong 5 Tablet is safe to use during breastfeeding. Human studies suggest that the drug does not pass into the breastmilk in a significant amount and is not harmful to the baby.
Side Effects: Treatment of Hypertension (high blood pressure) | Prevention of Angina (heart-related chest pain) | Prevention of Heart attack | Prevention of Stroke | Ankle swelling | Dizziness | Fatigue | Flushing (sense of warmth in the face, ears, neck and trunk) | Headache | Palpitations | Abdominal pain | Muscle cramp | Nausea | Sleepiness | Visual disturbance | Dyspepsia | Breathlessness | Change in bowel habits |

Uses:
Shelcal OS is a calcium supplement that contains a combination of calcium carbonate, vitamin D3, magnesium, and zinc. It is commonly used to support bone health and manage conditions such as osteoporosis, osteopenia, and calcium and vitamin D deficiencies. Shelcal OS is typically taken orally with or without food, as directed by your healthcare professional. The specific dosage and duration of use may vary depending on your individual needs and the guidance of your healthcare provider.  Shelcal OS is commonly used for the following purposes: Calcium and Vitamin D Deficiency: Shelcal OS is often prescribed to individuals who have low levels of calcium and vitamin D in their bodies. It helps replenish calcium stores and addresses vitamin D deficiency, which can occur due to insufficient dietary intake, limited sun exposure, or conditions that affect calcium absorption. Osteoporosis and Osteopenia: Shelcal OS is beneficial for individuals with osteoporosis or osteopenia, which are conditions characterized by reduced bone density and increased risk of fractures. The combination of calcium, vitamin D, magnesium, and zinc in Shelcal OS supports bone health and can help slow down the progression of these conditions. Pregnancy and Breastfeeding: During pregnancy and breastfeeding, there is an increased demand for calcium and vitamin D to support the development of the baby's bones and teeth. Shelcal OS may be prescribed to ensure adequate calcium and vitamin D intake during these periods. Elderly Individuals: As people age, the risk of calcium and vitamin D deficiency and conditions like osteoporosis increases. Shelcal OS may be recommended for older individuals to support bone health and prevent fractures. Calcium and Vitamin D Supplementation: Shelcal OS is used as a supplement to provide additional calcium and vitamin D to individuals who may not be getting enough of these nutrients from their diet alone.  Shelcal OS is generally considered safe when used as directed. However, like any medication, it may cause some side effects in certain individuals. Common side effects associated with Shelcal OS can include: Gastrointestinal Issues: Some individuals may experience digestive discomfort such as constipation, bloating, or gas due to the calcium content in Shelcal OS. Increasing fluid intake and incorporating dietary fiber may help alleviate these symptoms. Hypercalcemia: Excessive intake of calcium from supplements like Shelcal OS can lead to a condition called hypercalcemia, characterized by high levels of calcium in the blood. Symptoms of hypercalcemia may include nausea, vomiting, increased thirst, frequent urination, fatigue, and muscle weakness. It is important to use Shelcal OS as directed and avoid taking excessive doses. Allergic Reactions: In rare cases, individuals may experience allergic reactions to the ingredients in Shelcal OS. Signs of an allergic reaction may include rash, itching, swelling, dizziness, or difficulty breathing. If you experience any allergic symptoms, discontinue use and seek immediate medical attention. Interactions with Other Medications: Shelcal OS may interact with certain medications, including certain antibiotics, antacids, corticosteroids, and certain heart medications. It is important to inform your healthcare professional about all the medications you are taking to ensure safe use and avoid potential interactions. Other Rare Side Effects: Rarely, individuals may experience other side effects such as headache, dizziness, metallic taste in the mouth, or changes in urinary patterns. If you experience any persistent or severe side effects, it is important to consult your healthcare professional.  The specific dosage and instructions for using Shelcal OS should be provided by your healthcare professional. However, here are some general guidelines on how to use Shelcal OS: Follow the Recommended Dosage: Take Shelcal OS exactly as prescribed by your healthcare professional. The dosage may vary depending on factors such as your age, medical condition, and specific nutrient requirements. Do not exceed the recommended dosage unless instructed by your healthcare professional. Take with or without Food: Shelcal OS can generally be taken with or without food. However, it is advisable to follow any specific instructions provided by your healthcare professional. If you experience any stomach discomfort after taking Shelcal OS, taking it with food may help alleviate these symptoms. Swallow with Water: Take the tablet(s) with a glass of water. Avoid chewing or crushing the tablets unless specifically instructed by your healthcare professional. Timing of Administration: Shelcal OS can be taken at any time of the day, but it is recommended to establish a consistent routine to ensure regular intake. If you are prescribed multiple doses per day, spread them out evenly throughout the day as directed. Avoid Interactions with Other Medications: Some medications may interact with Shelcal OS, affecting its absorption or effectiveness. To prevent potential interactions, take Shelcal OS at least 2 hours before or after taking other medications. Follow the guidance of your healthcare professional regarding the timing of medication administration. Follow Regular Monitoring: Your healthcare professional may periodically monitor your calcium and vitamin D levels through blood tests to ensure that you are receiving the appropriate dosage and that your levels are within the desired range. Attend all scheduled appointments and inform your healthcare professional of any changes in your health or medication regimen. Always consult your healthcare professional or refer to the product label for specific instructions on how to use Shelcal OS. They will provide you with personalized recommendations based on your individual needs and medical condition. Shelcal OS works through the combined action of its key ingredients, which include calcium carbonate, vitamin D3, magnesium, and zinc. Here's how each ingredient works: Calcium Carbonate: Calcium is an essential mineral that plays a vital role in various physiological processes. In the body, calcium is primarily stored in bones and teeth, providing structural support and strength. When you consume Shelcal OS, the calcium carbonate component releases calcium ions in the stomach. These calcium ions are then absorbed into the bloodstream through the intestines. Adequate calcium levels are necessary for maintaining bone density, promoting proper muscle function, enabling nerve transmission, and facilitating blood clotting. Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol): Vitamin D3 is a fat-soluble vitamin that plays a crucial role in calcium absorption and utilization. When your skin is exposed to sunlight, it synthesizes vitamin D3. Additionally, vitamin D3 can also be obtained through dietary sources and supplements like Shelcal OS. Once in the body, vitamin D3 undergoes activation in the liver and kidneys, converting into its active form called calcitriol. Calcitriol enhances the absorption of calcium from the intestines into the bloodstream, allowing for optimal utilization of calcium by the body. Magnesium: Magnesium is a mineral that is involved in numerous biochemical reactions in the body. It is essential for maintaining normal muscle and nerve function, supporting a healthy immune system, and regulating heart rhythm. Magnesium works synergistically with calcium and vitamin D to support bone health. It assists in the conversion of vitamin D into its active form and helps with calcium absorption and utilization. Zinc: Zinc is a trace mineral that plays a role in various physiological processes, including immune function, protein synthesis, and wound healing. In relation to bone health, zinc is involved in collagen synthesis, which is a key component of bone structure. Together, the ingredients in Shelcal OS work synergistically to support bone health, maintain proper muscle function, aid in calcium absorption and utilization, and contribute to overall well-being. By providing supplemental calcium, vitamin D3, magnesium, and zinc, Shelcal OS helps meet the body's nutrient requirements, particularly in cases of calcium and vitamin D deficiency or conditions affecting bone health. If you forget to take a dose of Shelcal OS, it is generally recommended to take it as soon as you remember. However, if it is already close to the time for your next scheduled dose, it is advised to skip the missed dose and continue with your regular dosing schedule. Do not double the dose to make up for the missed one. It is important to note that consistent and regular use of Shelcal OS is important to maintain adequate calcium and vitamin D levels in the body, especially if you have been prescribed the medication for a specific medical condition. If you frequently forget to take your medication or have difficulty remembering, it may be helpful to set reminders or use pill organizers to stay organized and ensure timely intake. If you have any concerns or questions about missed doses or the proper use of Shelcal OS, it is best to consult with your healthcare professional. They can provide specific guidance based on your individual situation and recommend the most appropriate course of action. Monitor Calcium and Vitamin D Levels: Your healthcare professional may periodically monitor your calcium and vitamin D levels through blood tests. This is done to ensure that you are receiving the appropriate dosage and that your levels are within the desired range.

Report any Adverse Effects: If you experience any unusual or severe side effects while taking Shelcal OS, such as allergic reactions, gastrointestinal issues, or symptoms of hypercalcemia, seek medical attention immediately and inform your healthcare professional. Keep Out of Reach of Children: Ensure that Shelcal OS is stored in a safe place out of the reach of children and pets. Follow a Balanced Diet: Shelcal OS is a supplement and should not be used as a substitute for a balanced diet. It is important to maintain a nutritious diet that includes a variety of food sources rich in calcium, vitamin D, magnesium, and zinc Store Properly: Store Shelcal OS in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight and moisture. Follow any specific storage instructions provided on the packaging.

Betatrop Tablet is a hypertension (high blood pressure) medication. When a single drug is ineffective, this combination medication is used to manage blood pressure. Lowering blood pressure helps to avoid future heart attacks and strokes.

Mycept  250mg Tablet is a medication containing mycophenolate mofetil, which falls under the category of immunosuppressant drugs. These drugs are used primarily in organ transplantation cases to prevent the recipient's immune system from rejecting the newly transplanted organ, such as a kidney, heart, or liver. Mycept 500 Tablet works by reducing the activity of the immune system, thereby decreasing the chances of it recognizing the transplanted organ as foreign and attacking it. Mycept  250mg Tablet is used primarily to prevent the rejection of transplanted organs, manage certain autoimmune diseases, and reduce inflammation in some cases. Its main benefit is suppressing the immune system's response, which helps ensure the success of organ transplants and alleviates symptoms in autoimmune conditions. Common Side Effects: Less Common Side Effects:6. High blood pressure Mycept  250mg Tabletshould be used under the guidance of a healthcare provider and is typically prescribed to prevent organ rejection after transplantation or manage autoimmune diseases. The dosage is determined by your healthcare provider based on various factors, and it's crucial to adhere to their instructions. Take the tablets whole with water, without crushing or breaking them Mycept  250mg Tablet contains mycophenolate mofetil, an immunosuppressant medication. It works by inhibiting the activity of specific immune cells, particularly T and B lymphocytes, which are responsible for immune responses. Mycophenolate mofetil interferes with their ability to replicate by inhibiting DNA synthesis through its action on an enzyme called IMPDH. This immune suppression reduces the risk of organ rejection after transplantation and can help manage autoimmune diseases. If you forget to take a dose of Mycept  250mg Tablet, take it as soon as you remember, but if it's close to the time for your next dose, skip the missed one. Do not double the dose. Drinking alcohol while taking Mycept 250mg Tablet has no negative side effects. Mycept  250mg Tablet should not be used during pregnancy because there is clear evidence of danger to the developing infant. However, if the advantages outweigh the hazards, the doctor may rarely prescribe it in life-threatening conditions. Please consult your physician. Mycept  250mg Tablet should not be used while breastfeeding. According to the data, the medicine may be hazardous to the baby. In patients with severe kidney disease,Mycept  250mg Tablet should be taken with caution. Mycept  250mg Tablet dosage may need to be adjusted. Please consult your physician. There is little data on the usage of Mycept  250mg Tablet in patients with liver illness. Please consult your physician. Mycept  250mg Tablet is primarily used to prevent organ rejection in transplant recipients and to manage certain autoimmune diseases where the immune system attacks the body's own tissues. Mycept  250mg Tablet suppresses the activity of immune cells, particularly T and B lymphocytes, by inhibiting their DNA synthesis. This immune suppression reduces the risk of organ rejection or helps control autoimmune responses. Regular check-ups, including blood tests, are typically necessary to monitor your response to the medication and check for potential side effects. Follow your healthcare provider's recommended monitoring schedule. The duration of treatment with Mycept  250mg Tablet can vary depending on your medical condition and transplant type. Your healthcare provider will determine the treatment duration.
Side Effects: Organ Transplantation | Autoimmune Diseases | Rheumatoid Arthritis |

Uses: Composition:Teneligliptin (20mg) TENEPRIDE 20 TABLET contains Teneligliptin which belongs to the group of medicines called Anti-diabetic drugs. It is used to treat type II diabetes mellitus in adults in addition to proper diet, exercise and lifestyle changes. Type II diabetes mellitus is a chronic disease associated with abnormally high levels of glucose in the blood due to inadequate production of a hormone called insulin (produced by the pancreas to metabolize glucose) or due to inadequate sensitivity of body cells to the actions of insulin. Before taking TENEPRIDE 20 TABLET, inform your doctor if you have any liver or heart problems. You must also inform your doctor if you have hormonal problems, stomach problems (surgery in the gut) or if you are malnourished, starved, on an irregular diet.   Treatment of Type 2 diabetes mellitus Common side effects: Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. Tenepride 20 Tablet may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time. Tenepride 20 Tablet is an antidiabetic medication. It works by increasing the release of insulin from the pancreas and decreasing the hormones that raise blood sugar levels. This reduces the fasting and postmeal sugar levels If you miss a dose of Tenepride 20 Tablet, take it as soon as possible. However, if it is almost time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and go back to your regular schedule. Do not double the dose. It is unsafe to consume alcohol with Tenepride 20 Tablet. Tenepride 20 Tablet may be unsafe to use during pregnancy. Although there are limited studies in humans, animal studies have shown harmful effects on the developing baby. Your doctor will weigh the benefits and any potential risks before prescribing it to you. Please consult your doctor. Tenepride 20 Tablet is probably unsafe to use during breastfeeding. Limited human data suggests that the drug may pass into the breastmilk and harm the baby.
Side Effects: Dizziness | Headache | Diarrhea | Hypoglycemia (low blood glucose level) | Nausea | Vomiting |

Uses: Mitraz 15 mg tablet is a prescription medicine used in the treatment of depression. This medicine helps by increasing the level of chemical messengers (serotonin and noradrenaline) in the brain that have a calming effect on the brain and relax the nerves, thus treating your depression.

Composition : Losartan ( 50 mg)  Zaart 50 Tablet is a medicine used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure. Lowering blood pressure helps to prevent future heart attacks and stroke. This medicine is also effective in preserving kidney function in patients with diabetes.It is also used to reduce the risk of stroke (a condition that occurs due to reduced blood supply to the brain). Zaart 50 MG Tablet works by relaxing your blood vessels and lowering your blood pressure. Zaart 50 Tablet can be prescribed either alone or in combination with other medicines. It may be taken with or without food during the day or at night. However, try to take it at the same time each day to get the most benefit. It is important to continue taking it regularly even if you feel well or if your blood pressure is controlled. Most people with high blood pressure do not feel ill, but if you stop taking this medicine, your condition could get worse. This is a widely used medicine and is considered safe for long-term use. Common side effects: Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. Zaart 50 Tablet may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time. Zaart 50 Tablet is an angiotensin receptor blocker (ARB). It relaxes the blood vessel by blocking the action of a chemical that usually makes blood vessels tighter. This lowers the blood pressure, allowing the blood to flow more smoothly to different organs and the heart to pump more efficiently. If you miss a dose of Zaart 50 Tablet, skip it and continue with your normal schedule. Do not double the dose. Zaart 50 Tablet is unsafe to use during pregnancy as there is definite evidence of risk to the developing baby. However, the doctor may rarely prescribe it in some life-threatening situations if the benefits are more than the potential risks. Please consult your doctor. It is unsafe to consume alcohol with Zaart 50 Tablet Zaart 50 Tablet is probably safe to use during breastfeeding. Limited human data suggests that the drug does not represent any significant risk to the baby.
Side Effects: Treatment of Hypertenshion ( high blood pressure) | Treatment of Heart Failure | Prevention of heart attack and stroke | Dizziness | Decreased blood pressure | Hypoglycemia (low blood glucose level) | Increased potassium level in blood | Increased blood urea |

If you have concerns about weight changes, discuss them with your healthcare provider. This medication is typically used for individuals who already have type 2 diabetes. SGLT2 prevents glucose from being excreted in urine by absorbing glucose into the bloodstream as blood is being filtered in the kidneys. EMPACT 10MG is used to treat type 2 diabetes in adult patients (aged 18 years and older) that cannot be controlled by diet and exercise alone. It works by blocking a protein in the kidneys called sodium-glucose co-transporter 2 (SGLT2). Uses: Ketosteril is a brand name for a medical product that contains a combination of amino acids and ketoanalogues. It is often prescribed as a dietary supplement for individuals with chronic kidney disease (CKD) who are undergoing conservative management or are on a low-protein diet. Ketosteril is not a medication to treat kidney disease directly, but rather a nutritional supplement that aims to help manage the progression of the disease by reducing the load on the kidneys. Ketoanalogues are substances that are chemically similar to amino acids, which are the building blocks of proteins. When someone with CKD consumes protein, their kidneys may struggle to properly process the waste products produced during protein metabolism. This can lead to a buildup of toxins in the blood. Ketoanalogues are used to provide a protein source that generates fewer waste products compared to regular protein, thus reducing the burden on the kidneys. Ketosteril, when taken under medical supervision, can help manage the nutritional needs of individuals with CKD by providing essential amino acids and ketoanalogues while minimizing the production of waste products that the damaged kidneys cannot efficiently filter out. Ketosteril is primarily used as a dietary supplement for individuals with chronic kidney disease (CKD) who are on a conservative management plan or a low-protein diet. Its main purpose is to help manage the progression of CKD and alleviate some of the burdens placed on the kidneys due to protein metabolism. Here are the primary uses of Ketosteril: Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD):Ketosteril is prescribed to individuals with CKD, particularly those in the earlier stages, to help slow down the progression of the disease and manage its complications. CKD often leads to decreased kidney function and the accumulation of waste products in the blood. Ketosteril provides essential amino acids and ketoanalogues that generate fewer waste products compared to regular dietary protein, thus reducing the strain on the kidneys. Conservative Management:Some individuals with CKD, especially those who are not yet on dialysis, might choose conservative management, which involves dietary and lifestyle adjustments to manage their condition without resorting to more intensive treatments. Ketosteril can be used in conjunction with a low-protein diet to provide adequate nutrition while minimizing the production of waste products that need to be filtered by the kidneys. Low-Protein Diet:People with CKD often need to limit their protein intake to reduce the workload on their kidneys. However, proteins are essential for various bodily functions. Ketosteril can be used as a protein supplement to ensure that patients still receive essential amino acids while restricting their overall protein intake. Pre-Dialysis Preparation:For individuals with CKD who are approaching the stage where they might need to undergo dialysis, Ketosteril can be used as part of the preparation process. It helps manage protein intake and waste product buildup in anticipation of the more intensive treatment that dialysis entails. Ketosteril offers several potential benefits for individuals with chronic kidney disease (CKD) who are prescribed the supplement as part of their treatment plan. It's important to note that the benefits can vary depending on the individual's specific condition, kidney function, and overall health. Here are some potential benefits of using Ketosteril: Reduced Kidney Workload:Ketosteril contains essential amino acids and ketoanalogues that are metabolized with lower nitrogen waste production compared to regular dietary protein. This can help reduce the burden on the kidneys by decreasing the amount of waste that needs to be filtered and excreted. As a result, the progression of kidney damage might be slowed down. Adequate Nutritional Support:Individuals with CKD often need to limit their protein intake to manage their condition, but protein is essential for maintaining muscle mass and overall health. Ketosteril provides a way to maintain essential amino acid intake without overloading the kidneys with excess waste products. Delaying Dialysis:For some individuals with early-stage CKD, using Ketosteril alongside other management strategies might help delay the need for dialysis or other more intensive treatments. By managing dietary protein intake and waste product buildup, the onset of end-stage kidney disease could potentially be postponed. Improved Nutritional Status:CKD can lead to malnutrition and weight loss due to dietary restrictions and metabolic changes. Ketosteril can help provide the necessary nutrients, including essential amino acids, to maintain a better nutritional status and prevent muscle wasting. Potential Symptom Management:Some individuals with CKD experience symptoms like fatigue, weakness, and loss of appetite. Ketosteril's role in maintaining nutritional balance might contribute to alleviating these symptoms and improving overall well-being. Support during Conservative Management:Ketosteril can be beneficial for individuals who choose conservative management over more aggressive treatments. It enables them to manage their condition while maintaining their quality of life. Customized Dietary Approach:Ketosteril is often prescribed by healthcare professionals who can tailor the dosage and usage to the individual's specific needs. This personalized approach ensures that patients receive the appropriate amount of nutrients without exacerbating kidney function decline. Ketosteril is generally considered safe when used under the supervision of a healthcare professional and in accordance with their recommendations. However, like any medical intervention, there can be potential side effects, although they might not occur in all individuals. It's important to discuss potential side effects with your healthcare provider before starting Ketosteril. Here are some potential side effects associated with Ketosteril: Gastrointestinal Upset:Some individuals may experience gastrointestinal discomfort such as nausea, vomiting, or diarrhea when taking Ketosteril. These symptoms are usually mild and temporary. Allergic Reactions:Although rare, allergic reactions to any of the components in Ketosteril could potentially occur. If you experience symptoms such as itching, rash, swelling, or difficulty breathing, seek medical attention immediately. Metabolic Imbalances:Ketosteril is specifically formulated to help manage metabolic imbalances associated with kidney disease. However, incorrect usage or excessive intake could potentially disrupt electrolyte and mineral balance, leading to complications. Blood Urea Nitrogen (BUN) Fluctuations:Ketosteril aims to reduce the production of waste products, including blood urea nitrogen (BUN). Fluctuations in BUN levels might occur, especially during the initial adjustment period. Medication Interactions:If you're taking other medications, Ketosteril could potentially interact with them. It's important to inform your healthcare provider about all the medications and supplements you're taking to ensure there are no adverse interactions. Nutritional Imbalances:While Ketosteril is designed to provide essential amino acids and ketoanalogues, it's crucial to ensure that you're receiving a balanced and varied diet to avoid any nutritional deficiencies. Individual Sensitivity:Some individuals might be more sensitive to certain components of Ketosteril, leading to side effects. Monitoring for any unusual symptoms and communicating them to your healthcare provider is important. Digestive Issues:Changes in diet and supplements might lead to changes in digestive patterns. Some individuals might experience constipation or other digestive disturbances. Ketosteril tablets are usually taken with meals. Your healthcare provider will specify whether you should take them before, during, or after meals to ensure optimal absorption and effectiveness. Ketosteril works by providing a specialized blend of amino acids and ketoanalogues that help manage the nutritional and metabolic challenges associated with chronic kidney disease (CKD). Its primary goal is to reduce the workload on the kidneys and slow down the progression of kidney damage. Here's how Ketosteril works: Reducing Nitrogen Load:In individuals with CKD, the kidneys are less efficient at filtering waste products, especially nitrogen-containing compounds like urea. When protein is metabolized in the body, it produces nitrogen waste that needs to be excreted through the kidneys. Ketosteril contains ketoanalogues, which are structurally similar to amino acids but lack nitrogen. When these ketoanalogues are metabolized, they generate fewer nitrogen waste products compared to regular amino acids found in dietary protein. Balancing Amino Acid Intake:Essential amino acids are the building blocks of proteins and play a crucial role in various bodily functions. People with CKD often need to limit their protein intake to reduce the strain on their kidneys. Ketosteril provides a carefully balanced blend of essential amino acids and ketoanalogues, ensuring that the body receives the necessary nutrients while minimizing the production of waste products. Slowing Progression of Kidney Disease:By reducing the production of nitrogen waste and balancing amino acid intake, Ketosteril helps slow down the progression of kidney damage. High levels of nitrogen waste in the blood can contribute to complications associated with CKD, such as uremia and cardiovascular issues. By reducing these waste products, Ketosteril aims to improve overall health and quality of life for individuals with CKD. Supporting Conservative Management:Some individuals with CKD choose to manage their condition through dietary and lifestyle adjustments without resorting to dialysis or transplantation. Ketosteril provides a way to maintain essential nutrient intake while adhering to a low-protein diet, which is often recommended as part of conservative management. Preventing Malnutrition:Individuals with CKD are at risk of malnutrition due to dietary restrictions and the metabolic changes associated with kidney dysfunction. Ketosteril's combination of amino acids and ketoanalogues helps address this risk by providing essential nutrients that might otherwise be limited in a low-protein diet. Ketosteril works by providing amino acids and ketoanalogues that produce fewer nitrogen waste products compared to regular dietary protein. This helps reduce the workload on the kidneys and slow down the progression of kidney damage. Ketosteril is a medical product that contains a combination of essential amino acids and ketoanalogues. It is often prescribed as a dietary supplement for individuals with CKD to help manage their nutritional needs and reduce the burden on their kidneys. The benefits of using Ketosteril include reduced kidney workload, adequate nutritional support, potential delay of dialysis, improved nutritional status, and support during conservative management of CKD. Ketosteril is typically prescribed for individuals with chronic kidney disease (CKD), particularly those in the earlier stages, who are undergoing conservative management or are on a low-protein diet. No, you should never adjust the dosage of Ketosteril on your own. Always follow your healthcare provider's instructions and consult them before making any changes. Inform your healthcare provider about all medications and supplements you're taking to avoid potential interactions. They will guide you on any necessary adjustments.

FORACORT 200MCG INHALER contains Budesonide and Formoterol, which belong to the group of medicines called Inhaled corticosteroids, long-acting beta-adrenergic agonists. FORACORT 200MCG INHALER is used in adults and children above 6 years for the regular treatment of asthma and moderate to severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) with frequent symptoms and a history of recurrent exacerbations. Symptoms of these diseases includes difficulty to breath, coughing, wheezing, sputum production etc. It is used in adults and children above 6 years for the regular treatment of: Use FORACORT 200MCG INHALER exactly as advised by your doctor. It is for inhalational use only. Check the label carefully for directions before use. Your doctor will decide the correct dose and duration for you depending upon your age, body weight and severity of condition. FORACORT 200MCG INHALER contains Budesonide and Formoterol. Budesonide helps to decrease inflammation in the lungs whereas formoterol acts as a bronchodilator that helps the muscles around the airways in the lungs to relax. Together they help to ease breathing problems as well as prevent symptoms such as wheezing, cough, chest tightness, and shortness of breath due to asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary diseases. FORACORT 200MCG INHALER is generally not recommended for use during pregnancy or for those who are planning pregnancy due to a lack of safety data. Inform your doctor if you get pregnant in between the course of treatment with FORACORT 200MCG INHALER before discontinuing the medicine. FORACORT 200MCG INHALER is not recommended to use in breastfeeding mothers unless the expected benefit to the mother is greater than any possible risk to the child. Consult your doctor before using FORACORT 200MCG INHALER. FORACORT 200MCG INHALER has no or negligible effect on your efficiency to drive and operate machines. Consult your doctor before using FORACORT 200MCG INHALER. Use FORACORT 200MCG INHALER only when advised by your doctor. Do not self-medicate. Rinse your mouth with water and spit the water out after each dose of FORACORT 200MCG INHALER. Do not swallow the water. Gargle regularly and maintain good oral hygiene.

Uses: Glucomol 0.5% Eye Drop is used to treat elevated intraocular pressure (high pressure inside the eye) in people with ocular hypertension or open-angle glaucoma. You should only use it in the affected eye and take it regularly as prescribed by your doctor. Most people with glaucoma or high pressure in the eyes do not feel sick. Uses: Composition: Amantadine ( 100 mg)  AMANTREL 100MG contains Amantadine which belongs to the group of medicines called Dopamine agonists or Anti-viral agents. It is used in the treatment of Parkinson’s disease (a progressive nervous disease that causes tremor, muscular rigidity and slow imprecise movements), prevent and treats various strains of influenza A virus (caused by the multiplication of the virus inside the body). It is also used to treat shingles (herpes zoster) to reduce pain, which is a reactivation of chickenpox virus causing a painful rash and drug-induced extrapyramidal reactions (such as involuntary muscle contraction, tremors, stiff muscles, and involuntary facial movements caused by antipsychotics and other drugs). Before taking AMANTREL 100MG inform your doctor if you have any problems related to kidney, liver or heart (which may cause shortness of breath or ankle swelling), any mental illness like schizophrenia (mental disorder) or dementia (memory loss) and glaucoma (increased pressure in the eyes). Common side effects: Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Amantrel Capsule may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time. Amantrel Capsule is a dopamine agonist that treats Parkinson's disease. It works by increasing the amount of dopamine, a chemical messenger in the brain which regulates body movements. It also has an antiviral property. It works against viruses to prevent their growth and multiplication. It also appears to restricts the viruses to release infectious chemicals (viral nucleic acid) to enter into the body. Thus, it prevents and treats Influenza infection. If you miss a dose of Amantrel Capsule, take it as soon as possible. However, if it is almost time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and go back to your regular schedule. Do not double the dose. Amantrel Capsule may be unsafe to use during pregnancy. Although there are limited studies in humans, animal studies have shown harmful effects on the developing baby. Your doctor will weigh the benefits and any potential risks before prescribing it to you. Please consult your doctor. Amantrel Capsule is probably unsafe to use during breastfeeding. Limited human data suggests that the drug may pass into the breastmilk and harm the baby. It is unsafe to consume alcohol with Amantrel Capsule.
Side Effects: Treats parkinson’s disease (by improving muscle control and reducing stiffness, shakiness and shuffling) | Treats shingles (herpes zoster) to reduce pain | Prevent and treats various strains of influenza A virus | Treats drug-induced extrapyramidal reactions | Nausea | Dryness in mouth | Constipation | Dizziness | Blurred vision | Insomnia (difficulty in sleeping) | Hallucination | Peripheral edema | Balance disorder (loss of balance) | Orthostatic hypotension (sudden lowering of blood pressure on standing) |

Uses: Warfarin is an anticoagulant medication that is commonly prescribed to prevent blood clot formation. It is available in tablet form and is primarily used to treat and prevent conditions such as deep vein thrombosis (DVT), pulmonary embolism (PE), and atrial fibrillation (irregular heartbeat). Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) and Pulmonary Embolism (PE): Warfarin is often prescribed to treat DVT, which is the formation of blood clots in the deep veins, typically in the legs. It is also used to prevent the recurrence of DVT and to treat or prevent PE, which occurs when a blood clot travels to the lungs. Atrial Fibrillation (AFib): AFib is an irregular heartbeat that can cause blood clots to form in the heart. Warfarin may be prescribed to patients with AFib to reduce the risk of stroke and systemic embolism associated with blood clot formation. Heart Valve Replacement: After undergoing heart valve replacement surgery, patients are at an increased risk of blood clot formation. Warfarin is often prescribed in such cases to prevent clotting and subsequent complications. some of the common side effects of warfarin include bleeding (which can range from mild to severe), skin necrosis (rare), hair loss (temporary), and the potential for allergic reactions. Warfarin is available in tablet form and is usually taken once a day, typically in the evening. The dosage prescribed will depend on various factors such as the reason for taking warfarin, individual characteristics, and the desired level of anticoagulation. It's important to follow the prescribed dosage and not adjust it without consulting your healthcare provider. Warfarin works by inhibiting the synthesis of certain clotting factors in the liver, thereby reducing the blood's ability to clot. This helps prevent the formation of dangerous blood clots that can lead to serious complications like strokes or heart attacks Alcohol can interfere with the effectiveness of warfarin and increase the risk of bleeding. Limit or avoid alcohol consumption while taking warfarin. Warfarin's effectiveness can be influenced by the intake of foods rich in vitamin K, such as leafy green vegetables. It is not necessary to avoid vitamin K-rich foods entirely, but maintaining a consistent and balanced intake is important. Consult with your healthcare provider or a registered dietitian for specific dietary advice. The duration of warfarin treatment varies depending on the underlying condition being treated. In some cases, such as a deep vein thrombosis or pulmonary embolism, warfarin may be prescribed for several months to prevent recurrence. In other cases, such as atrial fibrillation, warfarin may be used long-term. The duration of treatment is determined by your healthcare provider based on your individual situation.

Typically, the tablet is taken orally with a full glass of water and with food to reduce the chance of stomach upset. Follow your doctor's instructions on dosage and timing. Ornidazole is an antimicrobial medication that works by inhibiting the growth and replication of susceptible bacteria and parasites. If you miss a dose, take it as soon as you remember. However, if it's close to the time for your next dose, skip the missed dose and continue with your regular schedule. Do not double the dose. If you're pregnant, planning to become pregnant, or breastfeeding, consult your doctor before using Ornidazole to discuss potential risks and benefits. No, alcohol should be strictly avoided while taking Ornidazole and for at least 3 days after completing the treatment. Alcohol consumption during this time can lead to severe reactions. It's generally recommended to swallow the tablet whole, as splitting or crushing might affect the intended release mechanism. Ornidazole can interact with certain medications. It's important to inform your doctor or pharmacist about all medications, supplements, and herbs you're taking to avoid potential interactions. There are generally no specific dietary restrictions, but it's a good idea to follow a balanced diet that supports your overall health.

Uses: Winolap DS Eye Drop belongs to a class of medications known as antihistamines. It's used to treat seasonal allergic conjunctivitis (eye infection, itching, redness, and swelling caused by pollens, dust, animal hair, and other allergens.

Glytears Eye Drop is an eye lubricant, often known as artificial tears, that is used to treat dry eyes. This can occur when not enough tears are produced to keep the eye moist. It helps to relieve the discomfort and burning associated with dry eyes by maintaining normal ocular lubrication.

Acular LS (ketorolac tromethamine ophthalmic solution) is a prescription eye drop medication used to relieve eye itching and redness caused by seasonal allergies. It belongs to a class of drugs called nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs). Ketorolac tromethamine works by reducing inflammation and suppressing the body's immune response in the eye.   Acular LS eye drops are primarily used to relieve itching and redness in the eyes caused by seasonal allergies, also known as allergic conjunctivitis. It can help manage the following conditions and symptoms: Allergic Conjunctivitis: This medication is particularly effective in reducing the itching, redness, and discomfort associated with allergic conjunctivitis, which occurs when the eyes react to allergens like pollen, dust, pet dander, or other environmental triggers. Ryzodeg 100IU/ml Penfill is a combination insulin product used to treat both type 1 and type 2 diabetes mellitus in adults and children. It consists of two types of insulin: insulin degludec, a long-acting insulin providing a steady release throughout the day to cover basal insulin needs, and insulin aspart, a rapid-acting insulin taken with meals to control post-meal blood sugar spikes. This combination aims to replicate the natural insulin release pattern in individuals without diabetes, offering comprehensive blood sugar control. Administered through an insulin pen device, Ryzodeg provides convenience for self-administration. It is crucial for users to adhere to healthcare provider instructions, monitor blood sugar levels regularly, and maintain open communication with healthcare professionals for optimal diabetes management.

Pantocid 20 Tablet is a medication that reduces the amount of acid produced in the stomach. It is used to treat stomach and digestive acid-related problems such as heartburn, acid reflux, peptic ulcer disease, and various other stomach problems connected with excessive acid production.

Uses: Composition:Adapalene (0.1% w/w) + Clindamycin (1% w/w) Deriva-Cms Gel is a combination of two medicines that effectively treats acne. Ask your doctor when you should stop treatment.

Uses: Modalert 200 Tablet is a medication used to treat excessive daytime sleepiness (narcolepsy). It enhances wakefulness and helps you stay awake, as well as lessens your tendency to fall asleep during the day, restoring the natural sleep pattern. Narcolepsy is a sleep disorder that causes excessive tiredness during the day. Excessive drowsiness, sleep paralysis, hallucinations, and, in certain situations, episodes of cataplexy (partial or entire loss of muscle control) may occur in the affected person. Modalert 200 Tablet stimulates the brain and awakens you completely. It also reduces these unusual sensations and helps to normalize the sleep cycle. This enhances your quality of life by restoring normal sleeping habits. You will feel more energized and perform better in your everyday tasks. Take this medication in the dose and for the duration prescribed by your doctor. Take it all at once. It should not be chewed, crushed, or broken. Modalert 200 Tablet can be taken with or without food, although it is best to take it at the same time every day. Modafinil is a psychostimulant that stimulates Orexin neurons. Orexin neurons are brain nerve cells that govern sleep/wake states. Modafinil stimulates orexin neurons, causing awake and decreasing the likelihood of sleep attacks. If you miss a Modalert 200 Tablet dose, skip it and proceed with your regular routine. Do not increase the dose.

This medication is also used to treat hypertension. TOR 20 Tablet aids your body in eliminating excess water and salt through urine. It may be taken alone or in conjunction with other medicines as per the dose suggested by your doctor. It can be taken with or without food and at the same time every day. To avoid having to get up in the middle of the night, avoid taking this medication within 4 hours of going to bed. Nasomet Nasal Drops are a medication that contains the active ingredient Mometasone Furoate. It is a corticosteroid and is used as a nasal decongestant. It works by shrinking the blood vessels in the nose, which helps to relieve nasal congestion caused by allergies, sinus infections, and the common cold. In simpler terms, Nasomet Nasal Drops help to reduce a stuffy nose by reducing the swelling in the blood vessels of the nose.

Mitraz 7.5mg tablet is a prescription medicine used in the treatment of depression. This medicine helps by increasing the level of chemical messengers (serotonin and noradrenaline) in the brain that have a calming effect on the brain and relax the nerves, thus treating your depression.

Domstal 10mg is a medication that contains the active ingredient domperidone. Domperidone is a dopamine antagonist that is primarily used to treat certain gastrointestinal disorders. Here is some general information about Domstal 10mg: Uses: Domstal 10mg is commonly prescribed for the relief of symptoms like nausea, vomiting, bloating, and heartburn associated with certain digestive disorders, such as gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), gastroparesis, and functional dyspepsia. It helps by increasing the movement of the stomach and intestines, allowing food to move more easily through the digestive system. Dosage: The dosage of Domstal 10mg can vary depending on the individual, the condition being treated, and the doctor's recommendation. It is usually taken orally, typically before meals. It's important to follow your doctor's instructions regarding the dosage and duration of treatment. Side Effects: Common side effects of Domstal 10mg can include headache, dizziness, dry mouth, constipation, and abdominal cramps. In rare cases, it may cause more serious side effects such as irregular heartbeat or allergic reactions. If you experience any concerning side effects, it is important to seek medical attention. Domstal 10mg, which contains the active ingredient domperidone, is commonly used for the following purposes: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD): Domstal 10mg can be prescribed to manage symptoms associated with GERD, such as heartburn, regurgitation, and discomfort. It helps by reducing the reflux of stomach acid into the esophagus. Gastroparesis: Gastroparesis is a condition in which the stomach takes longer than normal to empty its contents. Domstal 10mg can be used to improve gastric emptying and relieve symptoms like nausea, vomiting, bloating, and early satiety. Functional Dyspepsia: Functional dyspepsia refers to recurring or persistent indigestion symptoms without an identifiable cause. Domstal 10mg may be prescribed to alleviate symptoms like abdominal pain, discomfort, bloating, and early satiety. Nausea and Vomiting: Domstal 10mg is commonly used to relieve nausea and vomiting caused by various factors, including medications, migraines, chemotherapy, and post-operative conditions. The benefits of using Domstal 10mg (domperidone) can include: Relief from Nausea and Vomiting: Domstal 10mg is effective in managing nausea and vomiting associated with various conditions, such as gastrointestinal disorders, medication side effects, migraines, and post-operative recovery. By blocking dopamine receptors in the brain and gastrointestinal tract, it helps reduce feelings of nausea and the urge to vomit. Improved Digestive Symptoms: Domstal 10mg can provide relief from symptoms like bloating, abdominal discomfort, and early satiety that are often associated with conditions such as gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), gastroparesis, and functional dyspepsia. It enhances gastric motility, allowing food to move through the digestive system more efficiently. Enhanced Gastric Emptying: For individuals with gastroparesis, Domstal 10mg can help improve gastric emptying, allowing food to leave the stomach at a normal rate. This can alleviate symptoms such as nausea, vomiting, and bloating. Improved Quality of Life: By relieving symptoms such as nausea, vomiting, and digestive discomfort, Domstal 10mg can enhance overall well-being and quality of life for individuals experiencing these issues. It may allow them to eat more comfortably, improve their appetite, and participate in daily activities without the burden of persistent gastrointestinal symptoms.
